1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo nya pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA pa ri nirbA Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod
1b2(mdo sde): skad du| 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b3(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shi na chu klung
2a1(mdo sde): gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nyen kor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de na
2a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cus bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chung zla ba nya
2a3(mdo sde): ba'i nang par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi
2a4(mdo sde): yul gyi skad du shin tu zur phyin par don brda sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis srid pa'i rtse mo man chad go bar mdzad de/ deng
2a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa/
2b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/ skyabs chen po'i
2b2(mdo sde): gnas dang gzhi por gyur pa thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ sems can
2b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa tha ma la de lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid
2b4(mdo sde): kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang /
2b5(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs
2b6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin dang / gshin
3a1(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la phog pas de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang / ngan song dang /
3a2(mdo sde): mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/ /de nas mya ngan chen pos non te tshig mthun par kye ma khebs so/ /
3a3(mdo sde): khebs so/ /zhes kyang zer to/ /kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdob cing lus
3a4(mdo sde): 'dar zhing shin tu du'o/ /de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas/ ri dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'ang rab tu
3a5(mdo sde): g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing 'di skad du/ grogs po dag rings/ grogs po dag rings/ gyad
3a6(mdo sde): yul gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dong ngo 'dong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
3b1(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa las ldog la bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yan bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo/ /zhes zer te/ gcig la gcig 'jus
3b2(mdo sde): nas 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ zad do/ /
3b3(mdo sde): las mi bzad pa ni/ byung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa dag /myur cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag /myur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng gi yud tsam 'di la
3b4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na bdag cag mgon
3b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa dang / phongs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhig gu/ bdag cag gi the tshom dang / som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dang / de dag zhu bar bya'o/ /zhes kyang zer to/ /nyan thos chen
3b6(mdo sde): po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan kA t+yA ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan pa ku la dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod
3b7(mdo sde): de| de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas 'dar/ rab tu 'dar/ dam dam/ rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ brtabs/ rab tu brtabs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/
4a1(mdo sde): 'khams/ rab tu 'khams/ rmugs/ rab tu rmugs/ rengs/ rab tu rengs te/ de dag la sogs pa dag tu gyur nas chas so/ /de'i tshe dge slong sa
4a2(mdo sde): ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas brtan de dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba des phog nas shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te gcig la gcig 'jus so/ /de
4a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi
4a4(mdo sde): don thob pa/ tsan+dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng+ge lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa
4a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni/ langs/ mig ni/ mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog
4a6(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog
4a7(mdo sde): tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom
4b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu
4b2(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzang ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/
4b3(mdo sde): khur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso mo chen mo/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang / dge slong ma
4b4(mdo sde): nye dga' mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi
4b5(mdo sde): me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni/ langs/ mig ni/ mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
4b6(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul
4b7(mdo sde): bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba
5a1(mdo sde): byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang byang
5a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi mchog sa bcu thob pa sha stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs dang / bud med kyi dbyibs dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang /
5a3(mdo sde): rus pa'i lus 'chang ba rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe byang
5a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang mi mchog sa bcu thob pa/ thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stag la
5a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
5a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg
5a7(mdo sde): pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /snyam ste sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba
5b1(mdo sde): snyed du tshul khrims kyi bkod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /snyam pa dang /
5b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyis gdung mi 'chad par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems pa sha
5b3(mdo sde): stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro'i nyi ma
5b4(mdo sde): 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni/ langs/ mig ni/ mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan
5b5(mdo sde): nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs
5b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom
5b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing /
6a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dge bsnyen gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma
6a2(mdo sde): snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong
6a3(mdo sde): pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan pa ma
6a4(mdo sde): yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya
6a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / khyad par du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal
6a6(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas shing tshul khrims
6a7(mdo sde): blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngom par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig
6b1(mdo sde): rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi
6b2(mdo sde): 'chad par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa
6b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir
6b4(mdo sde): re res kyang tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam bsreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa yon tan can lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs
6b5(mdo sde): so| |de la yam bsreg shing sna re zhing yang gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas spras pas dkris pa/ ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis
6b6(mdo sde): gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ sna re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po/ /mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdog dkar/ kha cig tu sngo
6b7(mdo sde): skya/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/ kha cig tu ser pa mig tu sdug par byas pa sha stag go /bam po re re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go/ /chings ma'i the
7a1(mdo sde): gu mang po re re zhing yang ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / zar ma'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang / ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go /
7a2(mdo sde): de la chings ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa/ yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba sha stag go /de la yam bsreg shing sna re zhing yang
7a3(mdo sde): spos dri bsung zhim po dang / me tog phreng dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser thags kyis g.yogs pa dar snas brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shubs sngon po dang /
7a4(mdo sde): ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka li dka'i ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/
7a5(mdo sde): me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gis byugs pa sha stag go /yam bsreg shing sna re'i shing rta re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa gser gyis mdzes
7a6(mdo sde): par byas pa kha cig / kha cig tu sngon po dang / dkar po dang / bab la'i kha dog dang / li khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go /shing rta de dag gi gnya'
7a7(mdo sde): shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ dpe med pa/ rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go /rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs pas mgyogs pa/ spu kha chu skyar
7b1(mdo sde): gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang / rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan
7b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go /rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su'ang gdugs rtsibs dang / rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa 'od can las byas pa/
7b3(mdo sde): mu tig gi chun po dbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro/ /gdugs re re'i mdun logs su'ang gser gyi me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu baiDUR+ya las byas pa/ ze ba rdo rje
7b4(mdo sde): las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang ldan pa/ che ba/ mang ba sha stag dang / lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro/ /lda ldi chen po
7b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi mdun du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so/ /ri mo'i gzugs re re'i glo g.yas g.yon nas kyang zlos gar gyi gar thabs yul
7b6(mdo sde): dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gcig
7b7(mdo sde): pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do/ /gar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing gdung
8a1(mdo sde): gdung skad du dbyangs len to/ /gar thabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du'ang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i
8a2(mdo sde): skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag gis bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po blta na sdug pa/ gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba sha stag thogs so/ /de
8a3(mdo sde): dag gi mdun du'ang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo / /zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsan+dan
8a4(mdo sde): dmar po dang / a ga ru dang / thang shing gi me chung dus btsos pa dang / gang+gA'i klung gi chus btsos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha
8a5(mdo sde): ba dang / kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdangs skyed pa/ phan par 'gyur ba sha stag ga /sA la zung gi drung gi nyen kor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos brdal te/ ga bu sha'i
8a6(mdo sde): ras dang / snam bu dang / btsos snam dang / dre'u rdog dang / ka ling+ka'i ras dang / zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo / /grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad
8a7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis khor khor yug kyang gur gum gyis byugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bcas pa'i seng+ge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun
8b1(mdo sde): gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa/ ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so/ /g.yogs ma'ang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka
8b2(mdo sde): sgra sil li li dang / khrol shing gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni/ bskor/ rgya dar spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla re rnams ni/ bres/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni/
8b3(mdo sde): nyi mtshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni/ g.yabs/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma ka ra brten pa'i kha nas zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po
8b4(mdo sde): 'byung zhing dbyangs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni/ me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas gtor to/ /dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
8b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni/ zas sbyin no/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la ni/ skom sbyin no/ /mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad
8b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no/ /dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la'ang 'dod pa dang / dug dang / gnod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams
8b7(mdo sde): ma gtogs par gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dag chog par sbyar ro/ /snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni/ ci'ang mi sems so/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sde tshan/ byang
9a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las
9a2(mdo sde): 'da' bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing yan
9a3(mdo sde): lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni/ langs/ mig ni/ mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas rang
9a4(mdo sde): rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam bsreg shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan rnams dang chas te zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod
9a5(mdo sde): rnams thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog phreng dang / phye
9a6(mdo sde): ma dang / phye ma zhib bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi chad par char
9a7(mdo sde): bzhin du phab nas bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de skad du skad po che
9b1(mdo sde): 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na srog chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
9b2(mdo sde): gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su
9b3(mdo sde): gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang
9b4(mdo sde): lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor
9b5(mdo sde): ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang rang gi mchod
9b6(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
9b7(mdo sde): g ces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen ma tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bya ba phrag
10a1(mdo sde): mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni/ nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhags pas bsdus pa'o/ /lus
10a2(mdo sde): 'di ni| srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so/ /lus 'di ni/ rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i dri ma nam pa'o/ /lus 'di ni/ khyi ro rul pa'i dri bam gyis lhag
10a3(mdo sde): par sbags pa'o/ /lus 'di ni/ sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzags pa'o/ /lus 'di ni/ sha dang / chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / pags pa'i zhal zhal can/ rkang lag gi phyi
10a4(mdo sde): sgo dang / ra ba dang / ba gam can/ mig gi skar khung can/ mgo bo'i yang tog can/ yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o/ /lus 'di ni/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis
10a5(mdo sde): sbangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin po brten pa/ 'dam bu dang / e raN+Da dang / dbu
10a6(mdo sde): ba dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang / ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dba' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o/ /sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / zla ba'i gzugs
10a7(mdo sde): brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang sa na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyang ki dang / wa
10b1(mdo sde): dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byad/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te ba lang gi mig rjes su blugs par ni/ nus srid
10b2(mdo sde): kyi| lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa gzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa'am mi gtsang ba ni/ tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so/ /sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag tu
10b3(mdo sde): byas pa'am/ yungs 'bru tsam mam/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni/ zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni/ mthar thug par mi 'gyur
10b4(mdo sde): te| de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
10b5(mdo sde): pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs
10b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas pa/ srung ba lhur len pa/ bud med kyi lus ngan no/ /snyam du smod pa dang /
10b7(mdo sde): lus snying po med do/ /snyam du smod pa so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go/ /snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos sko ma la ngoms nas kyang gzhan
11a1(mdo sde): skom pa dag ngom par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
11a2(mdo sde): dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
11a3(mdo sde): bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig
11a4(mdo sde): pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rigs par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung
11a5(mdo sde): z hugs la bzhen pa'i phyir yam bsreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas ma bzhes nas bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur
11a6(mdo sde): te| ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa ba'i gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsa bI gzhon nu grong
11a7(mdo sde): khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam
11b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos srung ba la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la de dag thams
11b2(mdo sde): cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang / pang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas
11b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing log bar lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o/ /zhes legs par dam bcas
11b4(mdo sde): pa| tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul khrims la mi gnas pa rnams ni/ gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go /snyam du sems brtul ba/ dam pa'i chos sdug pa la
11b5(mdo sde): ni| bla ma bzhin du rim gro bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas pa/ dge 'dun la phan pa dang bde bar gnas par bya ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang des chog go /snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen
11b6(mdo sde): po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du yi dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste
11b7(mdo sde): li tsa bI gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa li tsa bI gzhon nu de dag kyang
12a1(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i bud shing thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru rnams dang / yam bsreg shing bye
12a2(mdo sde): ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo / /li tsa bI gzhon nu re re zhing yang glang po
12a3(mdo sde): che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so/ /nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so/ /glang po che re re'i mdun du'ang che ba la
12a4(mdo sde): 'os pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so/ /gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa de la'ang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig
12a5(mdo sde): yod do| |dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung du gang yin pa de la'ang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa de la'ang
12a6(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stong du phyin no/ /de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
12a7(mdo sde): du dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te zhal zas phul ba las bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/
12b1(mdo sde): re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe dzam+bu gling pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang+gA lnga'i bye
12b2(mdo sde): ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/
12b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te/ de dag thams cad
12b4(mdo sde): k yis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal
12b5(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi
12b6(mdo sde): rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa dzam+bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang /
12b7(mdo sde): yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ /rgyal po de rnams re re la'ang dmag 'khrugs ya
13a1(mdo sde): phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do/ /de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dag dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang
13a2(mdo sde): yod do| |de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer
13a3(mdo sde): nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ /de dag gi mchod pa da rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de'ang dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng gab par 'dug go /ba
13a4(mdo sde): dan gyi nang na chung du gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no/ /rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la'ang 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do/ /de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba
13a5(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi
13a6(mdo sde): ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang / bang pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de
13a7(mdo sde): dag ni/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drung nas
13b1(mdo sde): gcad do/ /zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can
13b2(mdo sde): nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to/ /de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go /de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung gis
13b3(mdo sde): ni| dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur to/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal sa bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol pa btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid
13b4(mdo sde): mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun ma me gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la
13b5(mdo sde): sogs pa dzam+bu gling pa'i rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs
13b6(mdo sde): kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol pa/ rtag tu lus sgom pa dang ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta
13b7(mdo sde): ste| yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bri yang gu zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu
14a1(mdo sde): gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir yam bsreg shing
14a2(mdo sde): rnams khyer te mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad
14a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag go /kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung ni/ dpag tshad brgyad du khyab
14a4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing skra 'bal la rang rang
14a5(mdo sde): gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing / skad mi snyan pas du ste bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sA la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig
14a6(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//
14a7(mdo sde): grogs po dag /ltos/ grogs po dag /ltos/ mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkur sti thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyi/ grogs po dag /bdag cag
14b2(mdo sde): gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdag cag gis phul
14b3(mdo sde): pa'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de bzhin gshegs pas mdzod cig gu / grogs po dag /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /
14b4(mdo sde): de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni/ ches dkon no/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni/ 'jig rten stongs par
14b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to/ /snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms
14b6(mdo sde): nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngom par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang 'chab
14b7(mdo sde): pa dang sgyu med pa/ theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos srung pa'i tshul khrims blangs pa/ 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa/
15a1(mdo sde): bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o/ /bdag cag gol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum
15a2(mdo sde): gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o/ /snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/
15a3(mdo sde): bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i
15a4(mdo sde): phyir bud shing dang / yam bsreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam bsreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang pa'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mi la dkon
15a5(mdo sde): pa sha stag go / shing rta'ang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar pa/ dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs ri mo brir yang mi nus pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can
15a6(mdo sde): gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang / gar thabs dang rol mo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa/ kha zas
15a7(mdo sde): zhim po mang po dag dang / seng+ge'i khri baiDUR+ya'i rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog
15b1(mdo sde): dri bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu
15b2(mdo sde): mi thub cing mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog
15b3(mdo sde): tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i chul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
15b4(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti'i mchog rnam po mang po dag byas te bskor ba'ang byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste rang rang
15b5(mdo sde): gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas rang rang gi skra 'bal cing skad mi snyan pas du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar
15b6(mdo sde): b a'i bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te cang mi gsung nas de dag re
15b7(mdo sde): thag chad de langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi na gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bol sogs pa klu'i
16a1(mdo sde): rgyal po gang+gA'i/ klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang
16a2(mdo sde): g i 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig
16a3(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'jus nas rang rang gi
16a4(mdo sde): m chod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil gyis mnan nas tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol
16a5(mdo sde): ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes
16a6(mdo sde): b ya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan
16a7(mdo sde): 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe dri za'i bdag po mis byin
16b1(mdo sde): g yi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la
16b2(mdo sde): m chod pa byas te rol mo snyan rgu byas nas phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur
16b3(mdo sde): te langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe mi'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa mi'am ci'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te snga ma rnams kyi
16b4(mdo sde): mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa bas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan
16b5(mdo sde): y ang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba las sdam bzhin du zhal zas
16b6(mdo sde): ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che
16b7(mdo sde): zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ lha ma yin gyi bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas
17a1(mdo sde): ma bzhes te yid mi dga' bar gyur nas langs te shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i
17a2(mdo sde): bu'i bdag po gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang+gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha
17a3(mdo sde): s tag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te shing sA la zung gi
17a4(mdo sde): drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma
17a5(mdo sde): snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sA la zung gi drung du snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan
17a6(mdo sde): y ang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri sil la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag lo gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad bas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur
17a7(mdo sde): gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang bung pa rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang / lo ma kha 'bus
17b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung stong gi
17b2(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can lags mthong ma la sogs
17b3(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer te/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spungs
17b4(mdo sde): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo ram+b+ha dang / urba shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur
17b5(mdo sde): bas ches lhag par mang zhing spa ba dag gis mdun du drangs te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs pa ba sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la
17b6(mdo sde): sogs pa gang+ga'i klung bye ba phrag snyong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang+ga'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu
17b7(mdo sde): m chod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas snga ma
18a1(mdo sde): bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rlung lha bzhi rlung gtong ba'i lha gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par yang shing
18a2(mdo sde): ljon pa dang / 'khri shing dang / shing gel pa dang / nags ma rnams dang / snye ma dang / me tog gi 'khri shing dang / byu ru rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan par byed cing dus tshigs thams cad kyi
18a3(mdo sde): me tog gi dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la/ lo ma kha 'bus pa rtsa ba dmar pa rnams kyis shing sA la zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po ja hong khar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas
18a4(mdo sde): mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin du shing sA la zung gi drung du 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa
18a5(mdo sde): 'bebs pa'i lha gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sde ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/
18a6(mdo sde): 'brug sgra dal nas sgrog pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag
18a7(mdo sde): chad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i me gsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang / lung tang mdog dang /
18b1(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi mdog sel dang / 'dod rgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gangs
18b2(mdo sde): kyi sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu
18b3(mdo sde): dang / rdo gu sna tha dad pa du ma dag sna'i thor tos byung zhing phung zhing khyer te rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrog cing lhags nas pad+ma'i
18b4(mdo sde): 'dab ma bcer ba'i seng+ge'i khri lda ldi dag bshams te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe seng+ge seng+ge'i
18b5(mdo sde): s gra sgrog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng+ge gang+ga'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis seng+ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me
18b6(mdo sde): tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i che bya ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka dam pa dang / zal mo dang / bzhad dang / khu byug
18b7(mdo sde): dang / ba li ka dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te rang rang gi skad phung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
19a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang / ma he mo dang / ra ma mo yod do cog gis kyang nu ma'o mas bkang ste shin tu rings par lhags nas shing sA la zung gi
19a2(mdo sde): drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas der rang rang gi nu ma'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang / phye ma dang / ba tshwas ma 'bags shing tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag
19a3(mdo sde): gzigs te/ 'o ma de dag gi nang nas sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa gling bzhi na gnas pa'i drang srong
19a4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang+gA'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam bsreg shing / zhal zas dag khyer nas
19a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo la
19a6(mdo sde): sogs pa ma gtogs par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so/ /g+han yang de'i tshe ri rab la sogs
19a7(mdo sde): pa ri chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi ri gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing mang po nyin mtshan gyi grib ma byed pa dang / brag zang
19b1(mdo sde): yags grib ma che ba dang / brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang / sman gshong rngo gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so/ /lha'i bu mthu bo che'i 'dun ma chen po dag kyang
19b2(mdo sde): ri rab dang bcas te mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che 'od chen po rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na
19b3(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gnas pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa lnga ma bas nyis 'gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar me'i
19b4(mdo sde): ' od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa de
19b5(mdo sde): bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi
19b6(mdo sde): nas shing sA la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la khang bzang ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu dang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar la sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyur to/ /sa gzhi ni/ skyed mos tshal dang /
19b7(mdo sde): rdzing bu'i chu pad+mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so/ /gcig tu na dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs can
20a1(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
20a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir shin tu du'o/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces zer te/ grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang / lha ma
20a3(mdo sde): yin dang / mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyi/ grogs po dag /

20a5(mdo sde): phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na/ de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag gis de skad ces
20a6(mdo sde): smras nas g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro/ /me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/

20b1(mdo sde): dang / san+ta ka chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can rnams dang / 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug

20b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur/ de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa/ de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams
20b7(mdo sde): dang / dri bsung chen po rnams khyer ro/ /khang bzang chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ tham skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas
21a1(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
21a2(mdo sde): ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung pa lags na/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad

21a4(mdo sde): pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang / 'od snga ma las khyad par du

21a6(mdo sde): de'ang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug ste/ rlung gis bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyar na/ ba dan de dag las pi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong
21a7(mdo sde): nas 'khyil ba lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas re thag chad de phyogs
21b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
21b2(mdo sde): mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor
21b3(mdo sde): zhing mdun du bdar te rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gzi byin zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ de dag gi ba dan phal pa gang
21b4(mdo sde): yin pa de'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste shing sA la zung gi drung du thug go/ /des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas
21b5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas tshangs pa dang / dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par
21b6(mdo sde): de'i bar gyi lha yod do cog gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs la/ rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
21b7(mdo sde): song ngo / /de'i gdugs phal pa'ang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes
22a1(mdo sde): nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams
22a2(mdo sde): cad phye nas de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig /sbyin pa'i tha
22a3(mdo sde): ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig / ces smras nas de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs phyung ngo / /sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing me chen po 'bar
22a4(mdo sde): b a rnams su'ang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus
22a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to/ /de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon kam+ba na dang /
22a6(mdo sde): lcags kyi ber ka dang / lcags mda' dang / sha ta ka ni ha dang / mda' dang / 'phang mdung dang / mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha rnam pa du ma yongs su spangs te chos lhur len par
22a7(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de'i mchod pa'ang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i khyon tsam mo/ /de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan
22b1(mdo sde): z heng rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rnga yab kyis g.yob bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
22b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis
22b3(mdo sde): de slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yi dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung 'jigs pa'i slad du'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i slad du'am/ thob
22b4(mdo sde): tu re ba'i slad du'am/ gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal pa'am/ gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du'ang rung ste/ theg pa chen po rjod par bgyid na/ de'i don du 'jigs pa dang / mi dga' ba
22b5(mdo sde): thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ thak+ke/ Ta Ta ra thak+ke/ ro ru re/ ma d+ha ro ru re/ A la mA la tA la swA hA/ chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang / 'jigs pas
22b6(mdo sde): gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du
22b7(mdo sde): bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du srung
23a1(mdo sde): sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ brjod pa tsam gyis ji ltar rus sbal rang gi lus srung ba de bzhin du bdag gis g.yo dang / sgyu ma mchis par de
23a2(mdo sde): dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan par yang bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas
23a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can/ khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'debs shig /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dis sems can
23a4(mdo sde): thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur bas na/ bzhes par bya'i/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ de lta ma yin gyi/ sdig can/ khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig /ces bka'
23a5(mdo sde): stsal nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'ang bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las ma bzhes te re
23a6(mdo sde): thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar te rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i
23a7(mdo sde): dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur gnyis 'gyur bas lhag pa
23b1(mdo sde): d ag khyer nas der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de'ang chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste mchod pa de lta bu sngon du
23b2(mdo sde): b tang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te lan du ma bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
23b3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni/ sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid
23b4(mdo sde): p a'i rngo ga la thogs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol bar ci gnang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang lan gnyis
23b5(mdo sde): lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten
23b6(mdo sde): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams khrag khrig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
23b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos lus chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod mi mjed
24a1(mdo sde): k yi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi thogs par
24a2(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song zhig /mchod pa chen po dag
24a3(mdo sde): kyang khyer te song la de la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas 'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig /khyod kyi
24a4(mdo sde): the tshom dang / yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang / de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /
24a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos
24a6(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas de'i
24a7(mdo sde): tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor/ rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/
24b1(mdo sde): shig shig /rab tu shig shig /mer mer/ rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem/ rab tu ldem ldem/ de la sogs pa byas te sa chen po rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa
24b2(mdo sde): dang | dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha ma yin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas skyi bung zhes byas te 'jigs shing / kha dang
24b3(mdo sde): lkog ma bskams nas 'bros par chas te rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te lha'i tshogs
24b4(mdo sde): de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs
24b5(mdo sde): kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'brog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
24b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
24b7(mdo sde): bu/ khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las
25a1(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma phul la/ khyod kyi the tshom dang / yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang
25a2(mdo sde): legs par zhus shig dang / des khyed la lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha'
25a3(mdo sde): yas 'di btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyod kyi 'od nyams par gyur to/ /de 'ong ba la rjes
25a4(mdo sde): su yi rang bar gyis shig / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la'ang ltos shig /ces byas so/ /de
25a5(mdo sde): nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / 'jig
25a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de mthong ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs
25a7(mdo sde): pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ 'di ltar bdag
25b1(mdo sde): nyid che ba yin te/ rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du'ang khyed la zhal ston par mdzad do/ /'khor de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba'ang yongs su mya
25b2(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis
25b3(mdo sde): bskor ba'ang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas pad+ma chen po byung ngo / /pad+ma chen po re re la'ang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la/ grong
25b4(mdo sde): khyer de dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag gru tsam sha stag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang 'obs bdun rim gyis bskor ba shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun rim gyis mdzes par byas pa sha
25b5(mdo sde): stag ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la ra ba de dag kyang dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi ba gam chen po sha stag gis bskor te/ ba gam thams cad
25b6(mdo sde): kyi bar bar na'ang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang / me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do/ /shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed
25b7(mdo sde): pa'i sgra snyan zhing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrog ste/ sgra de dag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /'obs de dag thams cad kyang chu bsil zhing shel
26a1(mdo sde): bzhin du dang bdag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug tu sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do/ /chu de dag
26a2(mdo sde): kyang pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis brgyan to/ /'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang skyed mos tshal gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ skyed mos tshal
26a3(mdo sde): re re la'ang rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do/ /rdzing bu'i chu dag kyang pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis
26a4(mdo sde): khebs par 'dug la shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas so/ /skyed mos tshal kho ra khor yug na'ang ngang ngur dang / zal mo dang / khrung khrung shug dag gis pad+ma'i
26a5(mdo sde): ze 'bru myang bar byed do/ /kho ra khor yug gi skyed mos tshal de dang / de dag na'ang khang khyim dag yod la/ khang pa re re la'ang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de/ rtsig pa ni/ gser
26a6(mdo sde): dang dngul dang bai DUR+ya dang shel las byas/ sa gzhi ni/ ke ke ru las grub pa ste/ nor bu'i 'jo tshar gyis spel zhing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal dpyangs pa dang ldan pa/
26a7(mdo sde): gser gyi rta babs chen po dang / skar khung dang / dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzang mthon po sa gzhi ni/ gser gyi bye ma brdal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /rdzing bu rnams kyang
26b1(mdo sde): 'brul pa'i lam gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog thag tu gser gyi chu shing gi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa'i lha'i tsan+dan gyi dri bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa
26b2(mdo sde): sha stag go/ /grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis
26b3(mdo sde): bskor zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ tsan+dan gyi chus
26b4(mdo sde): chag chag btab pa/ me tog gi sil mas gtor ba/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer chen po dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do/ /
26b5(mdo sde): pad+ma chen po de dag la'ang seng+ge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUR+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka ling+ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa/ che ba la 'os pa/ 'jig rten gsum na phul du
26b6(mdo sde): bya ba sha stag gis dkris te/ seng+ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing sems can gzhan dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni/ yi ge
26b7(mdo sde): 'bri| la la ni/ klog /la la ni/ kha ton slob bo/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad+ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can
27a1(mdo sde): d e dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang de dag yongs su spangs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod de nyis
27a2(mdo sde): 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i
27a3(mdo sde): 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang / zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas zhal zas de dag dang / pad+ma de dag gi dri bsung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag
27a4(mdo sde): kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus
27a5(mdo sde): chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom

27a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs
27b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs logs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po
27b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gi pad+ma dang / grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas

27b4(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can mi 'khod pa'i sgo skabs ci'ang med do/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang
27b5(mdo sde): bcas pa de rnams kyang kha cig ni/ sa phyogs smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do/ /kha cig ni/ khab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do/ /kha cig ni/ rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yongs su
27b6(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can yang tshe dang
27b7(mdo sde): ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par der ma 'ongs pa su'ang med de/ tha na mi gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdom
28a1(mdo sde): la sogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so/ /sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag tu 'khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig
28a2(mdo sde): pa'i las spangs nas gcig la gcig bu dang / ma dang / sring mo dang 'dra bar sems par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad
28a3(mdo sde): kyang gcig la gcig bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba
28a4(mdo sde): dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / rdu ba dang / tsher ma med par gyur te shing ljon pa rin po che'i 'khri shing gis dkris pa mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde
28a5(mdo sde): ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig
28a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
28a7(mdo sde): po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba gang yin pa de dag gi bya ba thams cad byas te phyir log nas bcom
28b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to/ /'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis gnon par gyur to/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od
28b2(mdo sde): z er de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas 'jigs shing skyi bur zhes byas te rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur
28b3(mdo sde): ba'i mi rigs na/ gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas da ni/ gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
28b4(mdo sde): gang las kyang zhal zas ma bzhes na/ kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam/ ci smyung bar bzhugs par chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam/ ci dam pa'i chos kyi
28b5(mdo sde): gru bying ngam/ kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do/ /de nas de dag rang rang gi yan lag rnams rmas par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to/ /chu klung gser ldan yang khrag tu 'bab par
28b6(mdo sde): g yur to| |de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi pa mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thabs cig tu langs te rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig rten dag
28b7(mdo sde): l a bltas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mchi ma mi thub bzhin du zhabs la
29a1(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i slad du bcom ldan
29a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul bar 'tshal te/ bdag ni/ mgon ma mchis
29a3(mdo sde): pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ phongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te yongs su mya ngan las
29a4(mdo sde): mi 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ khyim bdag gam/ bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de mthar
29a5(mdo sde): gyis zhing las brtsams nas des rmon glang rmo skyen pa thong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang / rdu ba dang / tshor ma ma mchis par bgyis te re ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las
29a6(mdo sde): chang 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang / bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang / ngag gi rmon glang dang shes pa'i thong gshol
29a7(mdo sde): gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang / rdu ba dang / tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te dge slong gi dge
29b1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/ bdag gi dbul ba bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bdag ni/ mgon ma
29b2(mdo sde): mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag
29b3(mdo sde): bla na med pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skul byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i
29b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs
29b5(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so/ /zhes thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes skad chen po phyung nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la
29b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mgar ba'i bu skul byed/ khyod skyid de ba khyod kyis mi lus thob pa ni/ phan thogs par gyur to/ /legs par thob bo/ /skul byed/ 'jig rten na u dum ba ra'i me
29b7(mdo sde): tog bzhin du mdzes pa ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o/ /de bas kyang ches chos thos pa
30a1(mdo sde): rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas na/ zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
30a2(mdo sde): pa thob par dka'o/ /mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dper na/ ston zla 'bring po nya la sprin med pa'i tshe zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na zla ba 'ba'
30a3(mdo sde): zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na/ khyod 'ba' zhig sems can thams cad la mngon du snang ngo / /khyod la yang dang yang
30a4(mdo sde): du phyag 'tshal lo/ /skul byed/ khyod ni/ mi'i lus byed bzhin du lha'i yang lha yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o/ /zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
30a5(mdo sde): kyang smras so/ /khyod ni mi ma yin te lha mchog yin/ /mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste/ /de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs/ /ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas/ /
30a6(mdo sde): bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod/ /skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir/ /'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la/ /bzhugs shing rgyun du bdud rtsi ston ces gsol/ /srid las
30a7(mdo sde): rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol na/ /bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis/ /de bas phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob/ /de nas la la zhig pha
30b1(mdo sde): ma gnyis shi ba las phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na/ mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa de kho na bzhin du mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas lag pa brkyang ste bcom
30b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag btsal nas langs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma deng bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod/ /da ni rnyed la sogs
30b3(mdo sde): las 'bral mi 'gyur/ /mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur/ /deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di/ /gser gyi phung po bas kyang lhag pa yin/ /dpa' bo de gshegs mgon dang phrad pas
30b4(mdo sde): na| |phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs pa med/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa/ /deng rnyed u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /rab 'jigs yi dwags 'gro ba yongs spangs shing / /
30b5(mdo sde): lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzod bcom/ /de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang deng phrad pa/ khab kyi rtse mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin/ /de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas/ rtag
30b6(mdo sde): tu lha yi 'gro bar 'phar bar 'gyur/ /chu gnas pad+ma chus mi chags pa ltar/ /drang srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun/ /drungs phyung bdag
30b7(mdo sde): nyid 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal/ /rgya mtsho'i nang gi rus sbal zhar ba'i mgrin/ /gnya' shing mig tu chud dka' 'dra ba las/ /bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul/ /de na bdag gis
31a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs gsog kun bcom/ /lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag /phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni/ /e raN+Da yi me tog 'dra
31a2(mdo sde): zhes des/ /bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon can/ /tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di/ /thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod/ /khyu mchog gnas su
31a3(mdo sde): son pa gang yin 'di/ /skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob/ /de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni/ /'jig
31a4(mdo sde): rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur/ /dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad cher bla/ /'di dag ma dor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs/ /lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ba/ /mtsho chen dbus na
31a5(mdo sde): mdzes par gnas pa ltar/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing / /dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar nyi ma gzi can shar ba na/ /'od zer dag gis sprin
31a6(mdo sde): srab sel ba ltar/ /drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis/ /skye bo mang po'i mya ngan deng bsal mdzod/ /sems can 'di dag dud mos mig skrangs shing / /sdug bsngal gcig bu'i rgya
31a7(mdo sde): mtsho'i gting du zhugs/ /de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing / /'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa/ skul
31b1(mdo sde): byed| de ni/ de bzhin no/ /de ni/ de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ u du ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /dad pa'ang rnyed par dka'o/ /chos thos pa'ang rnyed par dka'o/ /de
31b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed par dka'o/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang khyod ma ngu / mya ngan
31b3(mdo sde): ma byed par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo/ /snyam du dga' ba skyed cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan
31b4(mdo sde): 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig /mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig /'du byed
31b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig / ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar
31b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhol bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu lang tsho rga bas nges par 'joms/ /gzugs bzang nad med nad kyis
31b7(mdo sde): 'jig par 'gyur/ /srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin par byed/ /'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med/ /dbang phyug mi rtag tshe yang mi rtag ste/ /skye bo sdug bsngal 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig
