32a1(mdo sde): rten gsum na brtan po ci yang med/ /srid pa dag na 'gro kun srog tu 'dug /srid pa 'jig pa'i chos can rab g.yo ba/ /'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med/ /rga dang
32a2(mdo sde): 'chi dang nad dang rgud rnams kyi/ /'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed/ /srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med/ /thams cad dgra dang 'khu bar shes par gyis/ /de na 'khor zhing
32a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs dra ba yis/ /'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin/ /'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi/ /rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel ba gang / /mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa
32a4(mdo sde): de dag la/ /phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dod su zhig dga'/ /mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med/ /tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag mthong
32a5(mdo sde): na 'dod chags 'bral/ /de dag spangs bcad grol pa nyid du 'gyur/ /da ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par rgal/ /nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs/ /de phyir ngas ni mtha'
32a6(mdo sde): yas spros med pa/ /chags pa kun bsal thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med/ /nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med/ /nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis/ /khyod kyis nga ni med
32a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ma sems shig / de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos/ /nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /bde mchog de ni nga yi chos nyid de/ /rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyi
32b1(mdo sde): khyed ma ngu / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ de lags so/ /de ni/ de lags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ bdag
32b2(mdo sde): gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na/ sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma bdag deng du byang chub
32b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/ mchod par 'os pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /bcom ldan
32b4(mdo sde): 'das| dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu'ang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba
32b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing yang dag par 'dus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
32b6(mdo sde): bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni/ mi 'tshal lags so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal
32b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skul byed/ khyod 'di skad du bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ /kha zas tshig pa bzhin
33a1(mdo sde): du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'chal lo/ /zhes de skad ma zer cig/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni/
33a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pas na de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal/ 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
33a3(mdo sde): pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gal te 'du byed du gyur na/ lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ /'du byed rnams ni/ chu bur bzhin du shes shing shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba
33a4(mdo sde): yin no| |lha rnams ni/ mchog tu tshe ring zhes grag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ lo brgya'ang ma thub ste/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang ltar 'os pa ma yin no/ /
33a5(mdo sde): dper na/ mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por gyur nas blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/ rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed
33a6(mdo sde): pa la longs spyod pa las de phyir yang bsod nams zad cing dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/ gzhan gyis bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur pa ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbul por gyur
33a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur du zin na/ 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na/
33b1(mdo sde): lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du/ de bzhin
33b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/ 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal te de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dru na ni/ 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi
33b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug rnyed pa lha'i lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no/ /dper na/ rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur ba'i gyad cig yod la/ de gyad thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir gyad
33b4(mdo sde): stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/ de la gyad zla med pa'i phyir bla nas dbang thang chen po 'grub na/ ci gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam/ 'on te yon tan yod
33b5(mdo sde): na ni/ yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud dang / rang bzhin gyi bdud kyi gyad thams cad bcom
33b6(mdo sde): pas na| gyad stong thub bzhin du yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gsum po dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin gyi/ btsun
33b7(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtog cig/ dper na/ la la zhig phyug cing nor mang ba'i rigs su skye ba blangs la tshe thung bar 'gyur ba zhig ste/
34a1(mdo sde): de skar mkhan dag gis mthong nas khye'u 'di ni/ tshe thung ngo / /zhes bstan te/ de'i pha mas de skad thos na/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin
34a2(mdo sde): no| |snyam nas grangs su'ang mi rtsi zhing de la byams par mi byed do/ /de ltar skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ lha'am/ tshangs pa'ang rung ste/ gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par gyur na/ gal te
34a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid 'du byed du gyur du zin na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi nang na ni/ phyir
34a4(mdo sde): ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na/ gal te de ltar gyur na don med par gyur gyi/ btsun pa 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur ces de skad du ma
34a5(mdo sde): gsung zhig / dper na/ bud med gzhon nu dbul mo/ /bkren ma/ mgon med pa/ nad kyis thebs pa/ bar ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/ sbrum pas nyen pa zhig mgon med pa khang pa
34a6(mdo sde): z hig tu song ba las bu mo de bu byung nas de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de de'i nang nas bskrad de nyon mongs ma de bu btsas ma thag tu byis pa kha dmar khyer nas lo legs pa'i yul zhig tu
34a7(mdo sde): chas te song ba las lam du sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi tshan dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur to/ /gang+gA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa las de rgal bar ma nus so/ /
34b1(mdo sde): khye'u de khyer bzhin du gang+gA'i nang du shi nas de bu de la byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ byams pa'i bsod nams kyi
34b2(mdo sde): khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes sha na/ bdag ni/ shi'ang bla'i/ khye'u 'di nye zho med par thar par bya'o/ /snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis skyes pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jam
34b3(mdo sde): dpal| skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos dbyung bar 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya zhing / 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i mig
34b4(mdo sde): lus la med na'ang bcom ldan 'das ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /snyam du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdams ngag ston pas ni/ de bzhin
34b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no/ /zhes bstan par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni/ ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos gang+gA'i klung las bu bsgral ba'i phyir rang gi
34b6(mdo sde): srog dang bsdos te 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos dbyung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
34b7(mdo sde): pa 'dus ma byas par mthong na bdag nyid kyis don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te khyim gyi nang du
35a1(mdo sde): nyal ba las de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen po 'bar te/ mi de mes 'tshig na/ da ni/ srog med zin to/ /snyam nas ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan pas
35a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid gos kyis dam du dkris te sems dran pa dang ldan bzhin du shi nas de ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid de/ lan
35a3(mdo sde): brgyad cu byas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal srid ni/ lan 'bum byas/ mi'i 'jig rten du'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lan du ma byas te ngan song rnams su'ang mi skye la lan mang du bde ba gcig
35a4(mdo sde): nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' zhig thob pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/ khyod skyes bu dam pa dag ltar 'dzem par gyis shig/ ngo tsha shes par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed
35a5(mdo sde): kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma gzhug cig / dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no/ /zhes
35a6(mdo sde): zer bas ni/ mu stegs par gyur te shi'ang bla'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no/ /zhes zer pa gang yin pa de dag ni/
35a7(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no/ /zhes zer ba rnams ni/ rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa 'jam
35b1(mdo sde): dpal| de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig / da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyu ba na mi shes pa la bzlas te bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba'
35b2(mdo sde): zhig rtogs par gyis shig/ de ltar byas pa dang sgom pa de'i 'bras bus khyod myur ba kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal
35b3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /tshe ring bar gyur cig /rigs kyi bus ni/ de ltar bya ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin
35b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rtag pa dang / ther zug dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / brtan par shes so/ /da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar 'dus byas khong brlag tu btang ba'i sgo nas shes pa las na/ khyod kyang ring po mi
35b5(mdo sde): thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do/ /zhes phyis bsngags par
35b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /skul byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos myur cig /sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni/ smyur te sbyin pa mchog yin no/ /de la smyur te sbyin na zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
35b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe dge slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'ang rung ste/ don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas
36a1(mdo sde): dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang / de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa dang / brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa de ni/ smyur te sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /skul byed/ de bzhin du khyod kyis
36a2(mdo sde): ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung / nyung yang rung / /de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyed par yod kyang rung / khyed par med kyang rung ste/ 'brim du chug
36a3(mdo sde): cig / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'o/ /de nas skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal/ khyod kha zas la chags sam/ ci na zhal zas mang
36a4(mdo sde): yang rung / nyung yang rung / brims shig /ces bdag gi gzhen 'debs par byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa mdzad mdzad na/ ci da skad cig tsam yang gzhes
36a5(mdo sde): mi spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi sku yin te/ zhal zas kyi sku ma yin na/ ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
36a6(mdo sde): dpal| skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni/ de bzhin no/ /skul byed/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni/ theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o/ /khyod ni/ theg pa chen po la shed byed pa'o/ /
36a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te de ltar bzhed par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog cig /skul byed kyis smras pa/ ci bdag 'ba' zhig la
36b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyes sam/ 'on te sems can thams cad la'ang mnyes/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das lta khyod dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la'ang mi
36b2(mdo sde): mnyes sam/ skul byed kyis smras pa/ de skad ma zer cig /gang la mgu ba yod pa de la phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de/ 'u bu cag ni/ de la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ mnyes pa'am
36b3(mdo sde): dgyes pa med do/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ba be'u la byams pa'i phyir rtswa zos shing zos shing grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad
36b4(mdo sde): la'ang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /btsun pa 'jam dpal/ dper na/ rta cang shes dang sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla la bong
36b5(mdo sde): bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du 'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang 'dra ba dang / dgongs pa'i tshig dang mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan/
36b6(mdo sde): dper na/ nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba nam mkha' la gnas pas chu'i nang na nya dang rus sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal
36b7(mdo sde): bar mthong yang byis pa rnams kyis ni/ mig mi gsal ba'i phyir de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ skul
37a1(mdo sde): byed| de ni/ de bzhin te/ bdag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che ba nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du brgal bar zad do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
37a2(mdo sde): zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas de dag gi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go / de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa/
37a3(mdo sde): skul byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyi/ dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'brim du chug cig /ma thogs shig /rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das
37a4(mdo sde): kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skul byed/ nga
37a5(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror nges/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus su zas 'brim du chug cig /ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to/ /de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad
37a6(mdo sde): smras so| |kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni/ 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag thams cad kyis du zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
37a7(mdo sde): kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skul byed/ ma du zhig /de ltar lus la rma ma 'byin cig/ mi'i lus la chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtogs shig /smig rgyu ba dang / dbu ba
37b1(mdo sde): rdos pa dang / sgyu ma dang / rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang / glog lta bur khong du chud par gyis shig /'dus byas ni/ nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /snyam du shes par gyis shig /
37b2(mdo sde): 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de
37b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su mi gnang na/ bdag ci'i slad du mi ngu lags/ 'jig rten stongs kyi/ ma mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku la byed la 'di skad ces
37b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /nga ni/ khyod la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus
37b5(mdo sde): byas kyi chos nyid do/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag go /zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khong du chud par gyis shig /chos thams cad ni/ 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o/ /snyam du
37b6(mdo sde): rtogs shig / chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /snyam du dpyod cig /mi brtan pa/ brnyan pa/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /snyam du soms shig /lus 'di ni/ nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang
37b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'o/ /snyam du shes par gyis shig /'di ni/ dbu ba dang 'dra bar ltos la ma ngu zhig /yi ma chad cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
38a1(mdo sde): 'das| de ni/ de bzhin du 'jal lags nas/ ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
38a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa la ni/ bdag glo ba rangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bus ni/ nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa thabs de
38a3(mdo sde): ltar blta bar bya'o/ /skul byed/ sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni/ bya bzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bur shes par gyis shig /skul byed/ tshe ring ba dang / tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i rtags shes par
38a4(mdo sde): gyis shig / skul byed/ chos thams cad ni/ sgyu ma'i chos can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin la/ de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi
38a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /skul byed/ khyod srid pa'i rgya mtsho las nges par brgal bar bya ba ni phyir zhal zas smyur te 'on cig /lha dang / lha
38a6(mdo sde): ma yin dang / mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /khyod kyis kyang snod du gyur pa la dus su sbyin pa gyis shig /ma thogs shig/
38a7(mdo sde): snod du gyur pa dang / nga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/ don tha dad pa ma yin no/ /de nas skul byed kyis sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir mgo smad de mchi ma
38b1(mdo sde): blags nas gsol pa/ legs lags so/ /legs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
38b2(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'og tu ji ltar blta ba de ni/ bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas
38b3(mdo sde): mya ngan byed cing du bzhin du g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
38b4(mdo sde): la phyag btsal te zhal zas len du song ngo / /'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/
38b5(mdo sde): 'gul| rab tu 'bul/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor/ rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shig /mer mer/ rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem/
38b6(mdo sde): rab tu ldem ldem mo/ /de la sogs pa byas te mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs pa bzhin du sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man
38b7(mdo sde): chad thog thag tu rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi de dag thams cad mgo rmongs te 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas nas du bzhin du chig mthun par tshigs su bcad
39a1(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams/ /mgo bos phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni/ /bral na bdag
39a2(mdo sde): cag mgon med 'gyur/ /deng khyod mya ngan 'da' 'gyur 'di bsam na/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal shin tu gting zab bying / /thub pa bdag cag snying ni stor bar gyur/ /ba gzhon rkun
39a3(mdo sde): khyer be'u la chags pa bzhin/ /mgon med dbul po'i mi ni la la zhig /nad kyis thabs la sman pa med pa dang / /rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams/ /za ba ji ltar 'chi
39a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thabs/ /khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas/ /lta ba'i nyes pa bye 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bas phan phyir
39a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten ma dor cig / ji ltar grong khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang / /dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang / /ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin/ /khyod 'das 'og tu
39a6(mdo sde): bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur/ /sems can gces khyod mya ngan 'da' bzhed pas/ /sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogs kyang tshol/ /rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs/ /bdag
39a7(mdo sde): cag kun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po deng khyod mya ngan las/ /'das na nyi ma'ang sa la stung yang dag /rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang skam par 'gyur/ /bdag cag kun
39b1(mdo sde): kyang deng du 'gum lags grang / /ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gseb nas/ /glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid na/ /shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ /bdag cag thams cad rab
39b2(mdo sde): tu nyon mongs gyur/ /ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal zhing / /mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal/ /gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las/ /mi gzhes bdag cag thams
39b3(mdo sde): cad phongs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong bas/ /dud 'gro mang po'ang g.yar ngan cher bgyid na/ /bdag cag ji ltar g.yar ngan mi 'tshal lags/ /bdag
39b4(mdo sde): cag mchil ma bzhin du ma dor cig / nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas/ /mun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du/ /'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te/ /dge 'dun
39b5(mdo sde): dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ rgyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing phangs pa zhig mchis la/ des de chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslab nas
39b6(mdo sde): 'di sod cig / ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas bkum gyis ma mchis na/
39b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag cag mi 'gum par bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i
40a1(mdo sde): bstan bcos la brten pa na skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig / de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du bdag cag sems can dmyal bar
40a2(mdo sde): mchi bar ma mdzad cig / dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las
40a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis dang po nyon mongs pa la la la zhig gis khyod kyis na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/ des de la smras pa/ de ni/ de bzhin te/ gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las
40a4(mdo sde): thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi ba de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs nas/ rgyal po'i btson ra
40a5(mdo sde): nas thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ sman pa tshe'i rig
40a6(mdo sde): byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni/ rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyis kyi/ slob ma la ni/ bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du chos
40a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /de bzhin du shing rta la
40b1(mdo sde): shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni/ /rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni/ slob par mi bgyid pa dang / rig pa'i gnas
40b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ byis pa'am/ rgan po'am/ nad pa la la zhig lam bzang po las gol te lam ngan par mchis na/ shin tu
40b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myang bar
40b4(mdo sde): 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs so/ /ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la'ang de bzhin du rgyas par
40b5(mdo sde): sbyar ro| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/
40b6(mdo sde): de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung blo gros dang ldan pa dang / de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas ji ltar bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug
40b7(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams nges par bder gyur cig /mya ngan ma byed ma du zhig /'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi
41a1(mdo sde): chos| |thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis/ /bag med par ni ma gnas par/ /bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis/ /khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa'am/ rtag pa dang
41a2(mdo sde): mi rtag pa'am/ skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa'am/ 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'am/ rten dang rten ma yin pa'am/ ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa'am/ brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa'am/
41a3(mdo sde): sems can dang sems can med pa'am/ yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'am/
41a4(mdo sde): gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'am/ de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag la som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang / de dag
41a5(mdo sde): nga la zhus shig dang thams cad gcad par bya'o/ /bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
41a6(mdo sde): rnyed par dka'o/ /mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o/ /dad pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o/ /bzod pa dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma ral pa'ang shin tu rnyed par
41a7(mdo sde): dka'o| |'jig rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni/ gser gyi phye ma dang / u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o/ /dge slong dag /'di lta ste/ sa ni/ thams cad kyi sgo nas sems
41b1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad dang nga'i
41b2(mdo sde): sras dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go / gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/ yi ge 'bru
41b3(mdo sde): gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes thos nas mi dga'
41b4(mdo sde): g yur te| skyi bung zhes byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la
41b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par bstan to/ /zhes
41b6(mdo sde): gsungs te/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par
41b7(mdo sde): 'gyur| gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus pa yang dag par chad par 'gyur ba lags so/ /
42a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ ston gyi dus su zhing pas rmos cher btab ste rtsa ba 'dzings pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das
42a2(mdo sde): mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs
42a3(mdo sde): med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro/ /zhing slas thams
42a4(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na ni/ ston gyi zhing slas mchog tu bstan to/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper
42a5(mdo sde): gsol na/ rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe ba dag gi btson ra bsal te/ sems can rnams btson ra'i gnod pas snyon smongs pa las thar par bgyis nas de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyid pa de
42a6(mdo sde): bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyis kyang sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rar brubs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas de'i 'og tu yongs su
42a7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang dper gsol na/ sems can 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las
42b1(mdo sde): sman pa chen po dang phrad na 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod dang mjal na/ nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi
42b2(mdo sde): shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid lags so/ /
42b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan pos spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings pa las glang po che'i zhags pa de bcad de bros pa de
42b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog dang / dang na 'then dang / ser sna dang / g.yo'i zhags pa chen po bcad
42b5(mdo sde): nas glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs na sems can thams cad las nyon mongs pa'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su bsal bar bgyi'o/ /
42b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ grang ba'i rims kyis thebs pa sman pa chen po'i thad du mchis na/ sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
42b7(mdo sde): cag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / log par lta ba dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba'i nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa las sman pa chen po bcom ldan
43a1(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du mchis nas sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur te mi g.yo ba'i bde ba'ang thob lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang
43a2(mdo sde): dper gsol na/ mi zhig gis 'bras skyems 'tshal te ra ro bar gyur nas bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te/ chos kyang ma 'tshal/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma 'tshal/
43a3(mdo sde): 'di ni| bdag gi ma'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi sring mo'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi bu mo'o/ /snyam du'ang ma 'tshal la/ smad cing bla ste/ phyi sa dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing
43a4(mdo sde): mchis pa las de'i 'og tu bdag nyid sangs te gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas chang ni/ cir yang mi rung ngo / /snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ sdig pa thams cad
43a5(mdo sde): las thar to/ /snyam nas chang btung ba cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'di ni/ zlos gar
43a6(mdo sde): mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yongs su 'khyams pa na/ 'di ni/ bdag gi ma'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi sring mo'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi bu mo'o/ /snyam du
43a7(mdo sde): ma 'tshal nas ma dang / sring mo dang / bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de/ 'bras skyems kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur
43b1(mdo sde): l a| de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag 'bras skyems kyis ra ro ba las sangs pa bzhin cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms nas sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags
43b2(mdo sde): so| |gzhan yang e raN+Da la ni/ snying po mchis mi srid pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang /
43b3(mdo sde): byed pa po mchis mi srid de/ de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so/ /dper gsol na/ phub ma skon pa bye ba snyed bor ba ni/ cir
43b4(mdo sde): yang mi gces pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis so/ /dper gsol na/ kha sral gyi me tog la dri bda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis te/ de ltar
43b5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa ste/ de ltar sgoms
43b6(mdo sde): shig dang / de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa spang par 'gyur ro/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal te/
43b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' la bya'i rjes
44a1(mdo sde): gda' ba ni/ mi srid pa de bzhin du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
44a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ bsgom pa de ltar sgom pa khyed kyis shes sam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes de
44a3(mdo sde): ma lags pa bsgoms na ni/ ji ltar mi ra ro zhing 'khyams pas lha khang dang / spo dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / shing dang / ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar
44a4(mdo sde): mthong ba de bzhin du gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni/ ra ro ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/
44a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni/ yang dag par bsgoms lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ /da ni/ dpe 'di'i don de ngas bshad par bya'o/ /khyed
44a6(mdo sde): kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i don 'di la don ni/ 'di'o/ /yi ge ni/ 'di'o/ /zhes gsal bar mi shes te/ ji ltar mi ra ro bas lha khang dang / spo dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang /
44a7(mdo sde): shing dang / ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du 'du shes phyin ci log du mas zin cing kun tu rmongs pa rnams bdag go /snyam pa dang / rtag go/ snyam pa dang /
44b1(mdo sde): bde'o/ /snyam pa dang / sdug go /snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do/ /de la bdag ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rtag ces bya ba ni/ chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bde zhes bya ba ni/
44b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sdug ces bya ba ni/ chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni/ sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang /
44b3(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgoms lags so/ /zhes rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig /de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par gyur na ni/ nga'i bstan pa la khyed kyis
44b4(mdo sde): sgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de sgom pa don med par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal shes par bya ba sgom pa rnam pa gsum po ni/ khyad par dang / khyad par gyi'ang khyad par ro/ /sdug bsngal
44b5(mdo sde): la bde'o/ /snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /bde ba la sdug bsngal lo/ /snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /mi rtag pa la rtag go/ /snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log
44b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |rtag pa la mi rtag go / snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni/ phyin
44b7(mdo sde): ci log pa'o/ /mi sdug pa la sdug go/ /snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa'o/ /sdug pa la mi sdug go/ /snyam du 'du shes pa ni/ phyin ci log pa ste/ phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag
45a1(mdo sde): par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te mang du byas so/ /khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms so/ /rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang / bdag
45a2(mdo sde): yod pa la bdag med pa dang / sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so/ /'jig rten pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa
45a3(mdo sde): rnams la'ang bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod de/ 'di la phan tshun mi mthun pa yod do/ /yi ge zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /don ces bya
45a4(mdo sde): ba ni| 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log
45a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas lus su bzhag pa rnams ni/ bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mthong yang mthong / bsgoms kyang bsgoms lags na/ da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du
45a6(mdo sde): gsol| de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ci skad du bka' stsal pa de dag de dag de bzhin
45a7(mdo sde): du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gnang na/ bdag cag kyang sbrul gdug pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig mchis pa mi 'tshal te/
45b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ tshangs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs kyi/ khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom
45b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed de skad ma zer cig /dge slong dag /ngas 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
45b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten lta bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro/ /dper na/ rgyal po grong khyer mang po'i mnga' bdag
45b4(mdo sde): grong khyer zhig tu song ste/ khyim bdag cig rgyal por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas 'od srung chen po la dbang bskur ro/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyis sdug bsngal dang / mi
45b5(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dge slong dag /dper na/ so ka'i dus la bab pa na skye bo rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bskyil te rang rang gi
45b6(mdo sde): rkyal ba'i yo byad thogs nas chu'i nang du rtse bar byed la/ chu de'i nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che baiDUR+ya rigs dang ldan pa zhig bzhag nas baiDUR+ya de 'dod pa'i phyir de dag thams cad kyis rkyal pa
45b7(mdo sde): rnams bor te/ chu de'i nang du 'dzul nas de'i nang na gyo mo'am gseg ma ci yod pa dag la nor bu yin snyam ste blangs nas nor bu bdag gis rnyed do/ /bdag gis rnyed do/ /zhes zer zhing so so nas
46a1(mdo sde): steng du byung ste/ rdzing gi 'gram du 'khod nas 'di ni/ nor bu ma yin no/ /snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur la/ rdzing bu de'i chu'ang nor bu'i 'od kyis zla ba'i
46a2(mdo sde): 'od bzhin du mdzes par 'dug ste/ de dag gis mdzes pa de mthong nas e ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi nang nas thabs la mkhas shing yid rno
46a3(mdo sde): ba zhig gis nor bu de yang dag par rnyed pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/ /thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /thams cad mi rtag pa'o/ /thams cad mi sdug pa'o/ /
46a4(mdo sde): zhes thams cad kyi mu bzung nas bsgoms shing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rdzing gi nang gi gyo mo dang / gseg ma bzhin du nor zhing don med par gyur ta re/ skyes bu thabs
46a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa bzhin du gyis shig / khyed kyis thams cad kyi mu bzung nas gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dang de nyid la bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa yod de/ rnam pa bzhi po
46a6(mdo sde): de dag ni/ phyin ci ma log pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de bas na/ nor bu dang 'dra bar chos kyi de kho na nyid rtag pa'i 'du shes sgoms shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams
46a7(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa ste/ de ltar sgoms shig dang / de ltar sgom pa rnams kyis ni/ bdag tu 'dzin
46b1(mdo sde): pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
46b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /dge slong dag/
46b3(mdo sde): bdag gi the tshom nges par gcad par 'dod pas ni/ de skad ces dri dgos te/ legs so/ /dge slong dag /dper na/ grong khyer 'ga' zhig na rgyal po shes rab 'chal ba zhig rgyal po byed de/
46b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de la sman pa ngan pa zhig bdog la/ de'ang sman pa 'chal ba zhig ste/ bla nas dbang thang cher dbang la rgyal pos kyang bkur ba zhig yod pa des 'o ma 'ba' zhig sman yin par 'dzin la/ nad
46b5(mdo sde): kyi gzhi ni/ mi shes nas 'o ma'i dpyad log par zin pa de skye ba thams cad kyi rlung nad kyi sna grangs rnams la'ang gtong bar byed/ mkhris pa'i nad rnams dang / bad kan gyi nad rnams la yang gtong
46b6(mdo sde): bar byed de/ de de ltar byed kyang sman pa gces pa kho nar 'gyur la rgyal po de'ang 'chal ba'i bye brag mi phyed pa zhig go/ /de nas sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pa/ rgyud phyi ma shes pa
46b7(mdo sde): gzhan zhig yul gzhan nas gsar du 'ongs nas sman pa de'i thad du rten bcas te smras pa/ khyod kyi ming thos nas slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag mchis kyi/ khyod kyis bdag gi mkhan po
47a1(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ /de nas sman pa 'chal ba des de skad ces thos nas sman pa gsar du 'ongs pa de la smras pa/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nga la legs par
47a2(mdo sde): bsgrims te dka' ba spyad pas rim gro gyis la de'i 'og tu slobs shig dang khyod sman par 'gyur ro/ /de nas des de bzhin du mnyan te/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas des mthar gyis
47a3(mdo sde): sman pa 'chal ba de mgu bar byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyed kyis rtag tu bstan bcos thams cad la brtson par mdzod
47a4(mdo sde): cig dang / de ltar mdzad na/ rgyal por 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos kyang de ni/ bden te/ rnar 'ong ngo / /zhes byas nas rgyal po des sman pa 'chal ba de dang sman pa gcig shos kyi bye brag
47a5(mdo sde): phyed par gyur nas sman pa ngan pa de yul phyogs nas bskrad de sman pa bzang po gcig shos bkur bar gyur la/ de nas sman pa des da ni/ dus la bab bo/ /snyam nas rgyal po la 'di skad cas
47a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ gal te bdag la mnyes par gyur na/ gsol ba sna gcig gsol gyi/ gal te rgyal po chen po'ang dgyes pa lta na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos sman
47a7(mdo sde): pa la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i lag pa g.yas pa man chad nor re cog las gsol cig /sman pas rgyal po la gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po'i sman pa 'chal ba de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang lags pa de ni/
47b1(mdo sde): dug ha la ha la lags na/ des glo bar ma chud kyi/ rgyal po khyod kyi yul khams thams cad du bkas btags la sngon gyi sman pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang yin pa de ni/ dug ha la ha la yin gyi/
47b2(mdo sde): su sman du 'o ma 'thung ba de mgo bo gcad do/ /zhes bka' gdags par gsol/ /de ltar ma bgyis na/ sems can rnams dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni/ 'tsho
47b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur pa dang / nad ma mchis par 'gyur bar 'tshal te/ lha/ bdag ni/ gsol ba de 'tshal lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/ de lta na/ gsol ba chung ngu zhig
47b4(mdo sde): gsol te bka' gdags par bya'o/ /zhes byas nas bka' yang btags so/ /de nas bka' btags pa bzhin du thams cad du lugs su chud par gyur to/ /de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la'ang
47b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da dung yang lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin du bka' gdags par gsol zhes byas nas sman pa de ro mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / tsha ba dang /
47b6(mdo sde): bska ba dang / kha ba rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nad sos par byas so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po nad kyis thebs nas sman pa de bkug ste bsgo ba/ nga ni/ shi la thug gi/ rgyal po'i rkyen dang 'tsham
47b7(mdo sde): pa'i gsol ba ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin no/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la gsol ba/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni/ brdzun du smra ba lags so/ /'o ma ni/ bdud rtsi lags te/ khyed
48a1(mdo sde): kyi zhal zas 'o ma dang sbyar ba gsol 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po des sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod mkhris pas myos par byas sam/ 'on te nga slu bar
48a2(mdo sde): byed dam/ ca na/ sngar ni/ 'o ma dug yin zer la/ da ni/ 'o ma sman gyi mchog yin no/ /zhes zer/ kye ma sman pa snga ma bskrad pas phung ngo / /des kyang 'o ma'i dpyad bsngags pa las na/ de ni
48a3(mdo sde): sman pa chen po yin gyi/ sman pa ngan pa ma yin no/ /khyod kyis 'o ma'i dpyad byas pa ni/ khyod bdag bskrad pa'i rgyu yin no/ /zhes byas so/ /sman pas gsol ba/ rgyal po chen po/ de
48a4(mdo sde): ltar gzhan du mi dgongs par gsol/ /dper na/ shing ngam/ rtsig pa la srin bus brkos te yi ge'i 'bru 'dra bar gyur pa mthong yang mkhas pa rnams gyis srin bus yi ge shes so/
48a5(mdo sde): zhes brjod par mi bgyi/ yi ge sbyar ba lta bur gyur kyang ya mtshan du gzung bar mi bgyi ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyi sman pa snga ma'i 'o ma'i dpyad kyi las kyang srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge
48a6(mdo sde): bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/ de ni/ 'o ma so so'i bye brag kyang ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /rgyal pos sman pa de la smras pa/ kwa'i sman pa ngan pa des 'o ma so so'i bye brag ji ltar mi shes/ sman
48a7(mdo sde): pas gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'o ma ni/ bdud rtsi'ang lags/ dug kyang lags te/ de la bdud rtsi zhes bgyi ba ni/ ba gang be'u ha cang stobs dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang / chang
48b1(mdo sde): gi snyigs ma mi 'thung ba dang / nags khung dang / gshong dang / chu 'dam rdzab can na mi gnas pa dang / ba lang rdzis nu ma ma bzhibs pa dang / rtswa brngas pa mi gzan pa dang / rang gi khyu na
48b2(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / ma he'i khyu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan la/ de'i 'o ma lhag ma zag ma bcad par ran tsam bzhos pa'i 'o ma de ni/ nad do
48b3(mdo sde): cog zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/ mkhan po/ da ni/ ngas khyod kyi 'o ma'i dpyad bzang po'ang shes so/ /ngan pa'ang shes
48b4(mdo sde): so| |de nas rgyal pos bka' btags te 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba dang / 'bangs thams cad kyis rgyal pos phyir yang 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba thos nas sems 'khrugs te/ ci
48b5(mdo sde): rgyal po gdon gyis thebs sam/ 'on te bdag cag la mtho 'tsham mam zhes zer zhing / de ltar grong khyer gyi mi dang 'bangs thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te rgyal pos de dag mthong nas
48b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ sman pa 'di na re/ 'o ma de 'dra'o/ /zhes zer na/ khyed gsher ci yod ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal po dang / grong khyer gyi mi dang / 'bangs thams cad mgu bar gyur nas sman pa la mi
48b7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i bsnyen bkur byas nas 'o ma'i dpyad la yang bsten par byed pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
49a1(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
49a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sman pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten du byung nas mu stegs pa sman pa ngan pa dang 'dra ba thams cad kyi thad du gshegs te/ thams cad nges par btul zhing nges par
49a3(mdo sde): bshig nas rgyal po du ma mgu bar mdzad de/ mu stegs pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag med do/ /sems can med do/ /srog med do/ /gang zag med do/ /zhes gsung ngo / /mu
49a4(mdo sde): stegs pa rnams kyis bdag bstan pa ni/ srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ste/ de'i phyir ngas sems can thams cad la bdag med do/ /zhes bstan pa ston par mdzad do/ /bdag
49a5(mdo sde): med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig yin no/ /zhes chos kyi bka' 'dogs par mdzad nas yang gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi dbang dang / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dus mkhyen par
49a6(mdo sde): mdzad nas chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs de nyid du sman pa bzang po bzhin du bdag yod do/ /zhes yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag
49a7(mdo sde): mthe bo tsam dang / khre rgod kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya ba de lta bu ni/ ma yin no/ /'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa de lta bu yang ma yin te/ 'dir chos thams cad ni/ bdag med
49b1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'ang ma yin te/ bdag ni/ de kho na nyid do/ /bdag ni/ rtag pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ yon tan nyid do/ /bdag ni/ ther zug pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ brtan
49b2(mdo sde): pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ zhi ba nyid do/ /zhes sman pa bzang po'i 'o ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ston par mdzad de/ de sgom pa la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis brtson
49b3(mdo sde): par gyis shig / dge slong dag /gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang / som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig dang / ngas legs par gsungs pas
49b4(mdo sde): khyed rangs par bya'o/ /nga ni/ sgom pa thams cad las grol ba dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ston te/ dge slong khyed de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la rang bzhin gyis ston pa chen po
49b5(mdo sde): ma bstan to/ /zhes de skad ma zer cig /dge slong dag /gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang / som nyi ci dang ce yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig /de nas dge
49b6(mdo sde): slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba ni/ bdag cag gi yul ma lags te/ bdag
49b7(mdo sde): cag gis rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ khyod kyi gdams ngag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pas
50a1(mdo sde): na| bdag cag gis zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ mi la la rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ lo brgya nyi shu
50a2(mdo sde): rtsa drug lon pa/ nad kyis thebs pa/ mal khri la mchis pa'i nad pa zhig mchis la/ mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/ kye mi khyod kyis gter 'di longs
50a3(mdo sde): la gang gi tshe bdag lo bcu'am lo nyi shu na phyes nas phyir 'ongs pa dang / de'i tshe 'di bdag la phyir byin cig /ces bgyis nas des gtad de mchis la/ rgan po de'ang bu ma
50a4(mdo sde): mchis pa zhig ste/ mi de mchis nas ring po ma lags par mi rgan po de gum na/ mi de slar mchis te/ de de ltar nor gyi phung po chen po dang bral bar gyur kyang su la'ang ji skad bgyir
50a5(mdo sde): yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par bdag cag gis zhus pa de'ang nyan thos la yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la/ bdag cag
50a6(mdo sde): la'ang ji skad du zhu ba'i cha ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa ni/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur te/
50a7(mdo sde): de'i phyir ngas zhu ba'i skabs phye ba yin no/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ mi gzhon nu la la lo nyi shu rtsa drug lon te/
50b1(mdo sde): phyug cing 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig mchis la/ mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te 'di skad du kye bdag ni/ don gnyer du 'gro'i/ bdag phyir 'ongs pa
50b2(mdo sde): dang mi khyod kyis gter 'di bdag la phyir byin cig / ces bgyis nas mi des gter de legs par sbas shing legs par bsrungs te/ da slar mchis nas slar stsal pa de bzhin du bcom ldan
50b3(mdo sde): 'das| dam pa'i chos kyi dbyig legs par gsungs pa dge slong kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad la gtad na ni/ yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
50b4(mdo sde): na| 'od srung chen po la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa'i slad du'o/ /byang chub sems dpas zhus pa'i dbyig byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gtad na ni/ lo 'bum phrag mang por
50b5(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur la/ 'phel bar yang 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang sman par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ de
50b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo thogs la/ bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /zhes gsol nas cang mi zer bar 'khong do/ /de
50b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ dge slong dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /dge slong dag/ khyed zag pa med pas ni/ de skad bya ba yin no/ /dgra
51a1(mdo sde): bcom pas ni/ de skad bya ba yin te/ legs so/ /dge slong dag /ngas kyang khyod kyis bsam pa'i don de snga nas bsam mo/ /nga'i theg pa chen po ni/ byang chub
51a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lag tu gtad na/ rgyu gnyis kyis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
51a3(mdo sde): tshe ring po dag / gzhi gsum ma gtogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par khyed kyi yid gnyis dang / som nyi dang / the tshom ci yod pa nga la zhus shig /ces lan gnyis lan
51a4(mdo sde): gsum du bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdong bu'i grong du skyes pa bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang
51a5(mdo sde): r us gcig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyag btsal te lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas lha'i mchod pa'i
51a6(mdo sde): las chen po byas te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad
51a7(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /
51b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de
51b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhus shig dang / ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
51b3(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
51b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mthu dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus bdag gis zhu bar mi 'tshal na/ bdag ni/ sbrang bu dang 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tsan+dan lta bu'i 'khor
51b5(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa lags/ seng+ge lta bu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa lags/ baiDUR+ya dang / rdo rje chen po ltar mi phyed pa'i sku mnga' ba lags/ mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa lags/ ye
51b6(mdo sde): shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa dag kyang mchis te/ de ltar dpag
51b7(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis zhu ba'i rngo thogs par gyur na/ 'dir bgyi ba mang du mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs
52a1(mdo sde): pa'i mthus bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ thub pa cis na tshe ring 'gyur/ /rdo rje lta bur cis 'gyur
52a2(mdo sde): lags| |gang gis mi shigs thob par 'gyur/ /cis na lus brtan stobs chen 'gyur/ /ji ltar bgyis na mdo sde 'di'i/ /pha rol phyin par 'gyur ba lags/ /ji ltar srog chags
52a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi sems/ sna tshogs rtogs nas ston par 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po ji ltar na/ /rgya chen thob nas skyabs su 'gyur/ /ji ltar dgra bcom ma lags kyang / /dgra bcom rnams
52a4(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan ji ltar bgegs bgyid pa'i/ /bdud ni 'khor du chud par 'gyur/ /bdud kyi tshig kyang 'tshal ba dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung yang
52a5(mdo sde): 'tshal| |'dren pa ji ltar dga' bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i lam yang ston par 'gyur/ /dge dang yang dag ldan gyur nas/ /phyin ci ma log ston par 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po ji ltar na/ /
52a6(mdo sde): legs byed 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/ /thub pa byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /ji ltar brtag dka' khams mthong 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar yi ge yi/ /phyed ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba
52a7(mdo sde): lags| |ji ltar bzhad dang zal mo yi/ /spyod pa dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar phur bu pa sangs/ /nyi ma dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ji ltar
52b1(mdo sde): sems ni ma skyes par/ /'dir ni 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ka ta'i 'bras bu 'dra/ /ji ltar rtsod dus skyes pa na/ /gos pa ma mchis bgyid pa dang / /nyes pa'i dbyings su pad+ma ltar/ /nyes
52b2(mdo sde): dag gis mi gos lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /yul khams sman pa chen por 'gyur/ /chu 'gram kun tu mnyan par 'gyur/ /de 'dir bdag la lung bstan gsol/ /ji ltar
52b3(mdo sde): sbrul rnams pags pa rnying / /'dor ba bzhin du 'gyur ba lags/ /rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas dang / /'bru dang shing 'dra ji ltar lags/ /brtan po de dag nyan thos dang / /rang sangs rgyas
52b4(mdo sde): kyi byang chub kyis/ /sku gdung ji ltar ston par bgyid/ /mtha' yas sgo yang ji ltar ston/ /rgyal sras brtul zhugs brtan po rnams/ /ji ltar mi phyed 'khor dang ldan/ /de dag 'jig rten dmus long ba'i
52b5(mdo sde): mig dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po ji ltar na/ /mgo mang bye ba ston par 'gyur/ /ji ltar zla ba tshes 'dra bar/ /'jig rten rnams la chos kyang ston/ /ji lta bur ni gzha' gsang du/
52b6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /ji ltar lha dang bdud 'dra bar/ /brtan por 'gyur zhing dpa' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar chos kyi sgo rtogs nas/ /chos nyid kyang ni 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub
52b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams/ /nad med par yang 'gyur ba lags/ /sems can kun la sman pa'i phyir/ /de dag ji ltar dgongs pa 'chang / /ji ltar dge ba lhag mar bcas/ /ji ltar the tshom spong bar 'gyur
53a1(mdo sde): blo gros chen po ji ltar na/ /byang chub mchog tu nye bar 'gyur/ /cha phra gzigs ba khyod nyid kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsungs/ /chos rnams du ma'i
53a2(mdo sde): sgo dag kyang / /'dren pa khyod kyis bka' stsal cig /sems can kun gyi sman pa po/ /rkad gnyis rnams la sman ston cig /thub pa'i phung po 'di dag las/ /bdag gis zhu ba'i yul ma
53a3(mdo sde): mchis| |byang chub sems dpa' brtan rnams kyi/ /yul ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs
53a4(mdo sde): che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
53a5(mdo sde): ba'i mdo chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nang 'dri bar mdzad pa bzhin du 'dri ba ni/ legs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung mang po grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed
53a6(mdo sde): kyi pha rol na thams cad mkhyen pa rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa dag nga dang thabs cig tu byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi phyir rol te/ byang chub tsam pas de bzhin gshegs
53a7(mdo sde): p a'i gsang ba bstan pa'i don du byang chub kyi phyir rol ba de bzhin du khyod kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yon tan ming gcig pa'i tshul thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'dri zhing
53b1(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs mod
53b2(mdo sde): kyi cung zad cig zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ sbrang bus gnam dang rgya mtsho'i pha mthar mchi ba'am/ rgya mtsho'i chab 'tshal ba'i rngo thogs pa de ni/ mi srid lags
53b3(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag ni/ sbrang bu 'dra la/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ nam mkha' dang / rgya mtsho dang 'dra zhing ye shes zab mo chos dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
53b4(mdo sde): dper gsol na/ rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu dkor bas rang gi spyi bos blang ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bka' stsal pa yang dag par blang bar 'tshal na/ shes rab rgya bskyed pa'i slad
53b5(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshungs pa med pa yongs su bshad du gsol/ bdag zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
53b6(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu nyon cig / las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / las gang gis byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de gzung ba'i sems kyis nyon cig
53b7(mdo sde): dang / las kyi 'bras bu des na/ byang chub kyi rgyu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston cig /rigs kyi bu/ ngas kyang las de byas shing gzhan dag la'ang bstan pas bla na med pa yang
54a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig bu gcig pa thar par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i btson ra'i nang du 'gro ba de bzhin
54a2(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring bar 'dod pas kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms na/ 'tshe ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur la/
54a3(mdo sde): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / chos spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rigs
54a4(mdo sde): kyi bu| gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bslab pa'i gzhi la 'god par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro/ /gal te nus na/ sems can dmyal ba
54a5(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dud 'gror skyes pa rnams dang / las mi bzad pa byed pa'i sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su
54a6(mdo sde): 'jug par byed cing / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de la 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur te/ legs par byas pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu dang mthun pa
54a7(mdo sde): des na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mchog tu tshe ring bar 'gyur la/ ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
54b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci las bsam ste
54b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
54b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi 'tshal na/ tshig de ni/ mi 'dod par bgyi ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bstan pa 'di la
54b4(mdo sde): sems can kha cig tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa dag kyang mchis na/ ci lags/ sems can de lta bu dag la'ang bu
54b5(mdo sde): gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ de lta los kyang mod/ nga ni/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan
54b6(mdo sde): zin bzhin du lta'o/ /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'khor dag pa rnams kyis bco lnga'i gso sbyong la bab pa'i tshe gzhon nu ma
54b7(mdo sde): drangs pa/ lus ma sbyangs pa/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhig rtsig pa'i gra zhig tu yibs te nyan pa na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rdul zhi ba
55a1(mdo sde): mo bzhin phye mar brlags lags/ kye ma des de bkum pa ni/ lag na rdo rjes ha cang drags lags so/ /de lta na/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams
55a2(mdo sde): cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de skad ma zer cig /gzhon nu de ni/ sbrul ba yin te/ dam pa'i chos
55a3(mdo sde): sun 'byin pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang / bskrad par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de ltar bstan par zad kyi/ dam pa'i chos sun phyung yang rung / 'dod chen pa'ang
55a4(mdo sde): rung ste/ gsang du mi rung ngo / /rgyu gsog pa'i srog gcod pa ni/ byed mi phod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang ji ltar rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po dag dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa brlag
55a5(mdo sde): par byed pa de bzhin du nga ni/ brlag par bya zhes mi zer mod kyi/ de dag nyid kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du smin par zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/
55a6(mdo sde): de rnams kyi don du mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing 'od zer gcig gam/ gnyis gtong bar mdzad de/ gal te 'od zer des de dag lam phog na ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur te/ der de bzhin gshegs
55a7(mdo sde): pas ci byar yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gal te khyod kyis brtag dka' ba blta bar nus pa lta na/ ngas khyod la rgyu gzhan yang bstan par bya ste/ yul so so na tshul khrims
55b1(mdo sde): dang | cho ga dang / yon tan rnams tha dad pa yod la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dag dam pa'i chos khol du 'byin par 'dod pa la rgyal pos ston pa
55b2(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir gnod pa byed pa las rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan gyis bzlog ste/ des mthu chung bar byas nas rgyal po de chos la gnas par gyur na/ rgyal po gcig shos de la bsod nams chen por
55b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po gcig shos kyi nyes pa chen po'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang dper na/ zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam/ snye
55b4(mdo sde): long skyes na/ rtsa nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar gcad par ngas gnang ngo / /gang dag de rnams tshar gcod
55b5(mdo sde): par mi byed pa de dag ni/ nga'i bstan pa las shin tu ring ba yin no/ /gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni/ nga'i slob ma dang / nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig
55b6(mdo sde): pas gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de skad gsung na ni/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags/ ste'u dang tsan+dan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang
55b7(mdo sde): brlag par 'gyur na/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i rigs lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i mi rigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
56a1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ dper na/ khyim bdag gam/ tshong dpon nam/ sde dpon nam/ blon po'am/ rgyal po'ang rung pa zhig gis rang
56a2(mdo sde): gi bu sdug cing phangs la mchog tu mdzes shing byad gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad nas slob dpon de la 'di skad smras te/ bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul
56a3(mdo sde): ba dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyi/ 'di rnams khyod kyis 'dul ba dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / rig pa rnams slobs shig/ chos shig/
56a4(mdo sde): gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsum ni/ brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / tshar bcad pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/ gcig ni/ gson por 'dug ste/ gcig lobs par gyur na/
56a5(mdo sde): gsum ni/ shi'ang bla ste/ gsum ni/ shi /gcig ni/ lobs pa de la ci slob dpon gyis ni/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas zhes bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de la ni/
56a6(mdo sde): gnyis ka la'ang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de la ni/ 'khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/ de ltar bgyis na/ bsod nams mang po 'phel bar 'gyur
56a7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs
56b1(mdo sde): te| bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa
56b2(mdo sde): g.yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na/ ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge
56b3(mdo sde): bsnyen rnams la'ang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa mi mnga' ba lta la gos par ga la 'gyur te/ de dag nyid kyi yon tan dang spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod bzhin du
56b4(mdo sde): tshar gcod par bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ bu gcig pa'i 'du shes sgom pa yin te/ gang dag de ltar sgom pa de dag gis ni/ bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms par
56b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na/ sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin
56b6(mdo sde): bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ro/ /des na mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring ba dang / mchog tu tshe ring ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /'od
56b7(mdo sde): srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/
57a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta los kyang mod/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper gsol na/ gtam rgyud
57a2(mdo sde): mkhan zhig gis ltad mo pa'i 'khor gyi nang du ma la phu dud bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs bgyis la/ rang gi khyim du mchis nas mchog tu dka' ba bgyid bgyid pa'i ma la dbyug pa
57a3(mdo sde): dang / phag du ma dang / bong ba dang / rdo dag gis gnod pa bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na/
57a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring ba dang / mchog tu tshe ring ba dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / mi 'chi ba dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs nas/
57a5(mdo sde): ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid sku tshe thung lags/ ci slu ba mdzad dam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sems can thams cad la dgra bzhin du gzigs gzigs sam/ kye ma
57a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ dka' ba mdzad mdzad do/ /mi'i ltar brtsis na/ lo brgya'ang mi thub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
57a7(mdo sde): sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe de snyed kyi srog cig bcad lags/ 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mchog tu mi bzad pa'i las mdzad
57b1(mdo sde): lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di kho na ltar ma rgya zhig/
57b2(mdo sde): ma rgya zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
57b3(mdo sde): ni| mchog tu brtan pa'o/ /mchog tu zhi ba'o/ /mchog tu ther zug pa'o/ /mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin
57b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ dper na/ chu klung gang+gA dang / ya mu na dang / sa ra yu dang / hing+gu la la
57b5(mdo sde): sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams dang / chu bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ lha yul dang / sa'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung
57b6(mdo sde): yod do cog thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab ste/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo / /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ gzhan
57b7(mdo sde): yang 'di ltar chu klung chen po bzhi ma dros pa'i nang nas 'byung ba de bzhin du tshe ring pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung ngo / /'di ltar rtag pa thams cad kyi nang na ni/
58a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' mchog tu rtag pa yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nam mkha' bzhin du rtag go /'di ltar zhi bar byed pa thams cad kyi nang na ni/ mar 'ba' zhig
58a2(mdo sde): mchog tu zhi bar byed pa yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba dang / bsil bar gyur pa'ang mar dang 'dra ba'i chos ston to/ /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
58a3(mdo sde): 'das| gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ba lags na/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang
58a4(mdo sde): yun ring du bzhugs shing sprin chen po bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi char yang rab tu 'bab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ de bzhin
58a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig / 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa/ 'di na dge slong
58a6(mdo sde): ngam| dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ 'di las phyi rol pa'ang rung ste/ mngon par shes pa lnga la dbang thob pa de'ang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag
58a7(mdo sde): par gnas shing nam mkha' la 'chag par yang byed/ nyal bar yang byed la/ mchan g.yon logs nas me dang 'dra bar 'bar bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du chos gzhan du dud pa 'thul
58b1(mdo sde): ba lta bur yang ston/ tshe'i tshad kyang ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du snur bar byed do/ /mdor na ji tsam du 'dod pa dang / ji tsam du dga' ba de tsam du ston par byed de/ 'di dag ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga
58b2(mdo sde): la dbang thob pa'i yon tan yin no/ /gal te mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'ang de ltar bdag nyid 'tsho ba'i dbang phyug la dbang byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du ma brnyes pa lta ci ste/ de lta bu la
58b3(mdo sde): mnga' mi mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par ci ste mi bzhugs kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa yin par khong du chud par
58b4(mdo sde): gyis shig / 'jig rten 'di na sprul pa'i lus ni/ sha'i lus ma yin te/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa dug sman la rton pa'i sku yongs su 'dor bar mdzad do/ /snyam du'ang khong du chud par gyis shig/
58b5(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug ces bya ba'i brtan pa mchog la'ang brtson par gyis shig /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags
58b6(mdo sde): na| 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das par khyad par ci mchis lags/ 'jig rten pa'ang bdag cag gi tshangs pa ni/ rtag pa ste/ thog ma'i dus nas byung ba yin no/ /zhes mchi ba dang khyad par
58b7(mdo sde): ci mchis/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags na/ khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// //'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi
59a1(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gcig la ba lang sna tshogs spu mdog du ma rigs dang rgyud
59a2(mdo sde): mang po khyu gcig cing lhas gcig pa du ma bye ba snyed yod la/ des ba lang de dag ba lang rdzi'i lag tu gtad de mar zhim po za la/ ba lang rdzi rnams kyang lhas skyong zhing zho dang 'o ma srub pa
59a3(mdo sde): las phyi zhig na ba lang gi bdag po de rang gi tshe zad nas shi ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu nags na rgyu ba'i chom shod kyis ba lang de dag 'phrog nas de dag chung ma med pas rang rang gis 'o ma bsrubs
59a4(mdo sde): te| de dag gis bsrubs pa las 'os ma yin pa'i phyir 'o ma de dag las mar gyi dri'ang mi bro la/ zhor yang ma rung / dar bar yang ma rung / spris mar yang ma rung na/ mar du lta ga la
59a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rang bzhin las kyang nyams nas de dag gis de chus bslad de bdag gis mar longs spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis mar longs spyad par bya'o/ /snyam du sems pa bzhin du
59a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba nor dang chos rgyas pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rang gi lhas kyi bdag po bzhin
59a7(mdo sde): du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa chom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / 'dul ba dang / spyod yul rnams dang / sems can gyi khams
59b1(mdo sde): rnams gud du bsgyur nas sems can yod do/ /srog yod do/ /gang zag yod do/ /snyam du sems shing / thar pa ni/ 'di lta bu zhig go /spyod pa ni/ 'di lta bu zhig go /snyam nas spyod pa dang / sems
59b2(mdo sde): can dang / thar pa dang / rtag pa dang / de kho na nyid ma shes te/ don gzhan la brtson pas thar pa'ang mi thob la/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / 'dul ba dang / rtag pa dang / de kho na
59b3(mdo sde): nyid kyang mi rnyed de/ mi rgod kyi mar bzhin du 'jig rten pa rnams kyis chos kyi de kho na nyid mi 'thob la/ de dag sems can tshangs pas sprul pa ni/ rtag go /snyam du 'dzin cing / bdag gi ni/ thar
59b4(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /snyam du'ang 'dzin la/ chom shod pa rnams kyi 'o ma bzhin du de kho na nyid ni/ mi shes so/ /de dag tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / gzhan gyi chung ma spang pa'i rgyu dang / pha ma la phu dud byas
59b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus na/ chom shod pa rnams kyi 'o ma ma rung pa'i lhag ma tsam zhig yod pa bzhin du mtho ris kyi bde ba cha shas tsam zhig thob ste longs spyod par byed la/ de dag gis pha ma la phu dud bya
59b6(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes/ gzhan gyi chung ma spang ba ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes/ rtag pa ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes so/ /de
59b7(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni/ mi rtag pa yin/ rdzun pa yin te/ des na/ 'jig rten pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go/ /mi brtan no/ /snyam du 'dzin te/ de bas na/ mi rtag pa'i gnyen
60a1(mdo sde): por de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go / zhes bya ba la brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas ba lang gi lhas de'i skal pa can gyi 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po
60a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung la chom shod pa de dag gis kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus de ba lang gcig kyang med par mi byed do/ /de nas nags na rgyu ba'i chom shod
60a3(mdo sde): pa de dag gis ba lang gi lhas de bor te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim bdag rin po ches ba lang gi lhas de nyams su len par 'gyur te/ khyim
60a4(mdo sde): bdag rin po che des rang gi blos ba lang gi lhas de'i 'o ma'i de kho na nyid kyi thabs shes par 'gyur la/ ba rnams kyi 'o ma'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyis
60a5(mdo sde): n yid 'gyur du bzhor yod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung nas ba lang gi lhas dang 'dra ba'i 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su
60a6(mdo sde): 'dzin par mdzad pas na/ rtag pa'i sgra ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi rjes su mthun gyi/ 'jig rten pa chom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / rtags
60a7(mdo sde): kyis gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ khyim bdag rin po che bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyis ba lang gi lhas nyams su len par byed de/ sems
60b1(mdo sde): can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du chos kyi 'o ma 'jo bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyu des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa yin la/ 'jig rten pa rnams
60b2(mdo sde): la ni| rtag pa'i chos med de/ rtag pa'i sgra de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams 'ba' zhig la yod ces nga zer ro/ /de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis sangs rgyas
60b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni/ rtag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ ther zug pa'o/ /zhes de ltar shes par gyis shig /sems can gang dag rtag ces bya ba'i yi ge gnyis sgom pa de dag ni/
60b4(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs pa kho nar nga'i go 'phang dang lhag chad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe rtag go/ /zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis sgom pa nub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
60b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ces bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
60b6(mdo sde): bdag ni/ chos gleng pa 'di rtogs par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig 'di ji lta bu lags pa rgyas par bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos nyid ces bya ba
60b7(mdo sde): ni| lus yongs su 'dor ba ste/ lus yongs su 'dor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ smad pa'i tshig yin par shes par gyis shig /gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku bor nas slar yang sku len tam
61a1(mdo sde): mi len pa bdag zhu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de skad ma zer cig /'di ni/ chos nyid dpyod pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ dper
61a2(mdo sde): na| 'du shes med pa rnams la gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po gnyis med na/ sems can de dag ji ltar gnas/ ji ltar gda' /ji ltar snang / de dag gi 'du shes ji ltar
61a3(mdo sde): 'jug / ces 'dri ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs dang / gnas dang / spyod lam dang / bde ba rnams ji ltar bstan par bya
