335a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jigs rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
335a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon
335a7(mdo sde): mchog dam pa de la nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu yod de/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan pa/
335b1(mdo sde): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/
335b2(mdo sde): srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni/ de'i nyis 'gyur yod de/
335b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
335b4(mdo sde): med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa
335b5(mdo sde): dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/ /yang nyan thos
335b6(mdo sde): 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni/ de'i nyis 'gyur yod do/ /nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa la ni/ nyan thos khrag
335b7(mdo sde): khrig phrag brgya yong de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son
336a1(mdo sde): pa'i bar du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni/ de'i nyis 'gyur yod do/ /nyin re zhing chos ston pa thams cad la nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub
336a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du de bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa kun shes so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de'i nyan
336a3(mdo sde): thos 'dus pa ni/ rtsis mkhan nam rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal
336a4(mdo sde): pa bye ba'am/ bskal pa khrag khrig gam/ bskal pa gtams sam/ /bskal pa dkrigs sam/ bskal pa 'gyur yas kyi bar du'ang nyan thos 'dus pa 'di snyed ce'am/
336a5(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa bye ba
336a6(mdo sde): phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa gtams phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa dkrigs phrag 'di snyed
336a7(mdo sde): ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa khyad phyin phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces brtsi bar mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
336b1(mdo sde): dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs la skar ma'i gzugs 'di snyed ce'am/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ skar
336b2(mdo sde): ma'i gzugs stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ bye ba phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ gtams phrag
336b3(mdo sde): 'di snyed ce'am/ dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces rtsis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas kyang bgrang bar mi nus te/ 'on
336b4(mdo sde): kyang skar ma'i gzugs dpag tu med pa'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/ nyan thos 'dus pa de rnams kyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/
336b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed de/ las kyi
336b6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de nyan thos dang / byang
336b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du ro sna brgya ba'i zhal zas sbyar te rim gro byas so/ /yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol zhing yo byad
337a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sbyar te/ 'di ltar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis rtsa ba'i rim gro byas
337a2(mdo sde): s o| |des de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la ro sna brgya ba'i zas kyi rim gro byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon
337a3(mdo sde): par 'dus byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa
337a4(mdo sde): ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas so/ /dge ba'i ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shugs rgya che zhing grangs med
337a5(mdo sde): pa bskyed par gyur to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
337a6(mdo sde): med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod
337a7(mdo sde): du med pa bskyed par gyur to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
337b1(mdo sde): t u phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med pa rgya
337b2(mdo sde): chen po bskyed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod
337b3(mdo sde): du med cing rgya cher mngon par 'dus byas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nas brjod du med cing rgya che ba'i bar du mngon par 'dus
337b4(mdo sde): byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med
337b5(mdo sde): pa bskyed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med/ dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
337b6(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
337b7(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'ang rgyas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
338a1(mdo sde): l dan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che
338a2(mdo sde): zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa rgya che ba grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du
338a3(mdo sde): med| brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du med pa'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi
338a4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs grangs med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rgyal po
338a5(mdo sde): bde gnas blo gros kyis de lta bur pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas dga' ba dang / dbang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bas ta la bdun
338a6(mdo sde): s rid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
338a7(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ /stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas pa/ /chu bo bzhi rgal mi'i seng+ge/ /khyod la phul ba dpag med 'gyur/ /sbyin pa de yang zil mi non/ /
338b1(mdo sde): ba tshwa med pa'i zhing dag la/ /rdo dang bong ba gyo mo med/ /kun spyangs rab tu rmos pas na/ /mi mnyam med phyogs rtswa med par/ /ji ltar sa bon btab nas su/ /rmed pa'i mi
338b2(mdo sde): de 'dir nyal yang / /dus su rtsa ba brtan par zug /myu gu sngon por 'byung bar byed/ /klu yi sa la chus btab pas/ /lo ma sdong bu rnams kyang 'byung / /dus tshigs 'dus kyi rim
338b3(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /nges par 'bras bu smin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom/ /gti mug bral ba nges pa'i blos/ /ma smad yon tan zhing khyod la/ /shes rab gshol gyis
338b4(mdo sde): rmos pa ni/ /sa bon nyung ngu btab na yang / /de bzhin sbyin bdag mi brtson kyang / /pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs shing / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i myu gu skye/ /mgon po khyod la sbyin phul na/ /
338b5(mdo sde): byams pa snying rje nyon mongs med/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / /tha mar 'bras bu mya ngan 'da'/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /sa la dong ka men rgyas bzhin/ /bdag gis dge
338b6(mdo sde): pa'i rta bsags pas/ /ji ltar bde gshegs nge bzhin shog/ ji ltar bsod nams mtshan mnga' ba/ /legs spyad bsags pa thub pa'i tog/ ji ltar mi mchog dam pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang
338b7(mdo sde): bde gshegs de bzhin gyur/ /ji ltar dpe med blo can khyod/ /shes rab gnas la khyod gnas nas/ /lta bar rab tu bying ba yi/ /skye bo ma log 'god par mdzad/ /bdag kyang byang chub
339a1(mdo sde): reg nas ni/ /de bzhin bde la rab gnas te/ /log pa'i lam song skye bo rnams/ /bden pa bzhi yi lam du 'god/ /ji ltar khyod ni phung po med/ /bla med phung po zad
339a2(mdo sde): par zhugs/ /byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams/ /thams cad phung po 'dor du btsud/ /bdag kyang phung po med pa dang / /phung med byang chub mchog thob nas/ /phung pos bcings pa'i skye bo
339a3(mdo sde): rnams/ /phung po 'dor bar rab tu 'god/ /ji ltar khyod kyis nyon mongs spangs/ /chu yis me rnams zhi ba bzhin/ /nyon mongs me yis 'bar ba yi/ /skye bo sdug bsngal thar par mdzad/ /bdag
339a4(mdo sde): kyang byang chub ra reg ste/ /khro glen 'dod gsum me zhi nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i lam stor ba'i/ /skye bo rab tu zhi bar 'god/ /ser sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang / /phrag dog kun sbyor
339a5(mdo sde): mun pas bsgribs/ /srid par chags pa mgon med rnams/ /yan lag brgyad kyi lam la dgod/ /ji ltar rang byung khyod nyid ni/ /stobs bcu ye shes rab gnas te/ /srid sgom sems can
339a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig la/ /stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par mdzad/ /bdag kyang byang chub rab reg cing / /bla med ye shes thob nas su/ /srid skom sems can khrag khrig la/ /stobs bcu ye shes
339a7(mdo sde): ngoms par bgyi/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du
339b1(mdo sde): zas ro sna brgya ba sbyar zhing / yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol te bar snang la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad med/ grangs med/
339b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ /gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa bskyed nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs des bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sems can dmyal bar ma skyes/ dud
339b3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris su'ang ma skyes/ mi khom pa rnams su ma skyes/ rigs dma' bar ma skyes/ dbul po'i rigs su ma skyes so/ /
339b4(mdo sde): bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang lus la rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad ma byung ngo / /nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar ma gyur/ nam yang
339b5(mdo sde): mig ser ba dang / 'jigs pa'i mig dang / mig yo ba dang / bzhin yo bar ma gyur to/ /nam yang skyas bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par ma gyur/ nam yang
339b6(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang bral bar ma gyur/ lha'i nang du lhar gyur tam/ mi'i nang du mir gyur na/ nam yang dbang po dang / phyug po ma byas par ma gyur/ nam yang smon lam phun sum
339b7(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nam yang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes/ nam yang nad med pa dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / phyug
340a1(mdo sde): pas de sngon dregs par ma gyur/ nam yang bud med kyi dregs pa dang / gos kyi dregs pa ma skyes/ nam yang sbyin bdag ma byas par ma gyur/ de nam yang
340a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi dregs pa ma skyes/ nam yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin par ma gyur/ de nam yang thos pas dregs pa ma skyes/ nam yang mang du thos pa ma yin par ma gyur/
340a3(mdo sde): nam yang 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes/ nam yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ma bskor bar ma gyur/ nam yang tshangs par mi spyad par ma gyur te/ bsam ma thag tu bu rnyed par gyur to/ /
340a4(mdo sde): nam yang gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma skyes/ nam yang rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma skyes te/ de ltar rgyal po des shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bskyed nas byang chub
340a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan yang rab tu bsgrubs so/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jam dpal/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur
340a6(mdo sde): ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub
340a7(mdo sde): pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas
340b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs btsal bar bya'o/ /zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
340b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o/
340b3(mdo sde): /bam po gnyis pa/ 'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa
340b4(mdo sde): grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ /gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa na rgyal po'i drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba dang / mes byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung
340b5(mdo sde): ste| de gnyis nags shig na 'khod de/ de dag dgon pa nas dgon par/ nags tshal nas nags tshal du/ gshong nas gshong du/ nags thibs po nas thibs por 'gro zhing bdag cag
340b6(mdo sde): bud med dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na/ bdag cag 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs
340b7(mdo sde): na'ang bdag cag gnod sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa'am/ yongs su bzung ba la nyes par mi lta ba dang lhan
341a1(mdo sde): cig 'grogs par gyur na'ang bdag cag gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de lta bu'i nyes pa rnams mthong nas
341a2(mdo sde): dgon pa nas dgon par/ nags tshal nas nags tshal/ gshong nas gshong / nags thibs po nas thibs por rgyu'o/ /'jam dpal/ de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa
341a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams rtswa dang / shing dang / chu la ci bder spyod du gnang ste/ rjes su yi rang ngo / /
341a4(mdo sde): zhes tshig de skad ces smras pas/ drang srong de gnyis kyang rgyal po sde mi pham pa'i yul khams na gnas so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po sde mi pham pa la chom rkun nor 'phrog pas gnod pa'i
341a5(mdo sde): las byas te bros pa dang / drang srong de dag gis chom rkun bros pa mthong ngo / /chom rkun de dag gis kyang drang srong nags kyi nang na gnas pa mthong nas chom rkun de dag gis thal
341a6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong khyed la bdag cag mthong ngam zhes la la zhig gis dris na/ khyed kyis ma ston cig /de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lhas drang srong mes byin
341a7(mdo sde): la smras pa/ kye ma'o mes byin/ byung ba 'di ni/ shin tu dka' na ji ltar bya/ gal te 'di ma mthong ngo / /zhes smras na ni/ gzhan bslus par 'gyur/ ci ste bstan na ni/ gnod pa
341b1(mdo sde): byas par yang 'gyur na/ 'di ji ltar bya khyod smros shig /de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong mes byin gyis drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye tshangs pa'i lha/ 'di la
341b2(mdo sde): gnod par 'gyur par ma 'dzin cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa'i lha/ gang la la dag lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams
341b3(mdo sde): kyis sems zin nas 'dug go/ /tshangs pa'i lha/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos snum can la rdul reg na chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshangs pa'i lha/ gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la
341b4(mdo sde): lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin nas 'dug go/ /tshangs pa'i lha/ gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la mi lta ba de dag la
341b5(mdo sde): ni| yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i lha/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos yongs su dag pa la rdul gyis reg kyang sprugs
341b6(mdo sde): ma thag tu de med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshangs pa'i lha/ gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la mi lta ba de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing gnas
341b7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ tshangs pa'i lha/ bdag cag kyang lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i lha/ gal te bdag cag lus dang srog la ma bltas na/ bdag cag yongs
342a1(mdo sde): su zag pa 'byung ba des sems zin nas gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /kye tshangs pa'i lha/ lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pas brtul zhugs 'grub bo/ /zhes
342a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma stsal to/ /de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la drang srong mes byin gyis lus dang srog la mi lta ba bstan pas lus dang srog la mi lta
342a3(mdo sde): pa rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa chom rkun de dag tshol zhing nags stug po der phyin te/ rgyal po sde mi pham pas nags stug po'i nang na drang srong de dag gnas pa mthong ngo / /mthong
342a4(mdo sde): nas drang srong de dag ga la ba der song ste/ mi kha cig nags stug po der chom rkun tshol du bkye'o/ /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te
342a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong khyed gnyis kyis chom rkun nags stug po
342a6(mdo sde): 'di'i nang du 'ongs pa'am/ phyir byung ba lta mthong ngam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong de gnyis kyis rgyal po sde mi pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po bdag cag gis bdag
342a7(mdo sde): nyid kyang mi mthong na/ chom rkun lta ga la mthong / rgyal po sde mi pham pa dang drang srong de dag gtam 'di byas pa dang / rgyal po'i mi de dag gis chom rkun de dag zin te/ de dag gis de
342b1(mdo sde): dag zin nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /chom rkun de dag bzung ste mchis pa 'di lags zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang
342b2(mdo sde): srong de gnyis kyis smras pa'i don khong du ma chud nas drang srong de gnyis la smras pa/ khyod ni/ rdzun zer ba yin te/ drang srong ma yin no/ /zhes de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa gcod du
342b3(mdo sde): bcug go / 'on kyang drang srong de dag gis gzhan la gnod pa ma byas so/ /de nas yang drang srong mes byin rkang lag bcad pa dang / rgyal po sde mi pham pa la 'di skad smras so/ /kye rgyal po/ /
342b4(mdo sde): khyod nyid la bdag kun tu btsal na/ rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gang yin/ ci mig rgyal po sde mi pham pa'am/ 'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa mig las gzhan nam/ ci
342b5(mdo sde): rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ 'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa las
342b6(mdo sde): gzhan nam zhes drang srong des bdag mi dmigs par bstan pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtog go /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na/
342b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid ma dmigs so/ /don dam par bdag nyid mi dmigs pas 'gyod pa chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ nyes pa med pa'i drang srong gis bshad pa'i don ma shes pas 'phral
343a1(mdo sde): d u sdig pa'i las byas pa des chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod nas sa'i phyogs de na
343a2(mdo sde): 'gre zhing ldog go / de nas drang srong mes byin des rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'gyod par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ji ltar bdag nyid mi dmigs pa
343a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du su'i rkang lag bcad pa de'ang mi dmigs so/ /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa la drang srong mes byin gyis stong pa nyid bstan pas kun nas dkris pa de myur du bsal
343a4(mdo sde): te chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid myur du rtogs nas des de gnyis la ston par 'du shes bskyed do/ /drang srong de dag gis de la tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod de/ rgyal po
343a5(mdo sde): chen po| tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems la smon pa 'grub ste/ rgyal po chen po/ tshul khrims su yongs su dag pa'i mthu la gzigs/
343a6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par yang sems ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des
343a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig / ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to//
343b1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par lus kyi las ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag
343b2(mdo sde): cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig / ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/ /rgyal po chen
343b3(mdo sde): po| bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par 'tsho ba ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi rkang
343b4(mdo sde): pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig / ces byas pa dang / 'di ltar drang srong mes byin de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis drang srong de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/ /
343b5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po snga mi pham pas de gnyis kyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong mes byin gyis bden pa'i byin gyi
343b6(mdo sde): rlabs thos pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de de na 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i tshul khrims
343b7(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par gyur to/ des de nyid nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste/ la la ni/ bla na med pa
344a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ la la ni/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ la la ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
344a2(mdo sde): 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams la 'doms/ la la ni/ tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ la la ni/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
344a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngar drang srong mes byin rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo / /des drang srong mes byin de rdzu 'phrul
344a4(mdo sde): k yi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa sems can rnams la ston cing bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu brjod pa
344a5(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig du ma mthong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
344a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i shugs rnams kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags te bar snang la 'dug nas drang srong mes byin de dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la rdzu
344a7(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do/ /ji ltar dri med me long dkyil 'khor
344b1(mdo sde): la| |lus la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'/ /de bzhin tshul khrims yongs dag dge ba la/ /sems la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'/ /'dod bzhin 'bras bu 'byung ba'i
344b2(mdo sde): shing chen ltar/ /bsam pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/ /de bzhin tshul khrims phung po gtsang dag pas/ /bsam pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/ /ji ltar sa la rab tu las
344b3(mdo sde): byas te| |bsam pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam par gyur/ /de bzhin tshul khrims phung po yongs sbyangs pas/ /bsam pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu byi
344b4(mdo sde): dor bgyis/ /bsam pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin/ /de bzhin tshul khrims phung po byi dor bgyis/ /bsam pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis
344b5(mdo sde): thog mar spyad gsungs pa/ /tshul khrims yongs dag thog ma'i rkang pa ste/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dri med rkang pa des/ /byang chub zhi pa mchog rnams yang dag grub/ /ji ltar shing rgyal n+ya
344b6(mdo sde): gro gzhon nu 'dir/ /sa gzhi mnyam par btsugs shing rab bskyed na/ /yal ga byung zhing mngon par rab tu skye/ /me tog 'bras bur ldan zhing khyad par 'dzin/ /de bzhin tshul khrims
344b7(mdo sde): phung por su gnas pa/ /rgyal pa'i sras de yon tan rnams kyis skye/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dir reg nas/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar byed 'gyur/ /tshul khrims
345a1(mdo sde): ldan pas dpal dang gzi brjid rnyed/ /tshul khrims ldan pa gzugs rab mdzes par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims dag la rgyal sras rtag dga' ba/ /rnyed par
345a2(mdo sde): dka' ba'i chos kyang rab tu skyed/ /spyod pa yongs dag tshul khrims kun spyod pa/ /dri med khrims ldan drang srong mes byin 'di/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mnga' ba brgya dag gis/ /
345a3(mdo sde): kun tu bstod pa mdzad pa bdag gis mthong / /tshul khrims yongs dag kun tu spyod pa la/ /sangs rgyas brgyas ni mngon par bstod gyur dang / /ji ltar bdag gi slob dpon mes
345a4(mdo sde): byin la| |sangs rgyas brgya yis mngon par bstod pa ltar/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims gzi brjid ldan pa bdag /legs par spyad pa brgya yis mngon par bstod/ /skyes nas bdag gi
345a5(mdo sde): khrims stobs gdung med de/ /rims nad btab pa gso ba byas pa bzhin/ /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i bde bar
345a6(mdo sde): gshegs/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po rgyu ba dang / /tshul khrims bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa mthong / /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba
345a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig mang po rnams/ /bla med byang chub rim par sangs rgyas te/ /bdud rnams bye ba khrag khrig btul ba mthong / /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /bde
345b1(mdo sde): gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/ /dgra bcom bstod cing mtshungs med 'khor lo mchog /'gro la phan phyir rgyal bas bskor ba mthong / /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas
345b2(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag /skye bo mun pas bsgribs shing mi mkhas pa/ /bde gshegs sdug bsngal brgya las 'grel ba mthong / /dri med tshul
345b3(mdo sde): khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/ /sems can khrag khrig btul te mdzad pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs dad pas bsgral phyir bzhugs
345b4(mdo sde): pa mthong / /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/ /'gro ba'i don chen mdzad pa mdzad nas su/ /yang 'byung med par
345b5(mdo sde): mya ngan 'da' ba mthong / /dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/ /mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel rab rgyas shing / /skye bo
345b6(mdo sde): bde bas mngon du tshim mdzad mthong / /de ring slob dpon khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /bdag gi mig kyang bsam mi khyab par dag /de phyir phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba rnams/ /sgrib pa
345b7(mdo sde): med pa'i mig gi stobs kyis mthong / /bdag gi mtshungs med tshul khrims yongs dag pas/ /de las bdag gi sgrib med mig 'di skyes/ /tshul khrims phung po yongs su sbyangs pa
346a1(mdo sde): las| |sgrib pa med pa'i mig ni bdag gis thob/ /'di ltar thal sbyar slob dpon mchog khyod la/ /gang gi mthu che ba ni de 'dra ba/ /de la thal mo mngon
346a2(mdo sde): sbyar phyag 'tshal cing / /mtshungs med rdul bral byang chub reg par bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
346a3(mdo sde): shugs de rnyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed
346a4(mdo sde): pas phyogs bcu mun pa med par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa
346a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang len cing 'dzin to/ /de tshun chad nam yang dran pa nyams par ma gyur te/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du dus thams cad du'ang thos pa 'dzin par
346a6(mdo sde): gyur to| |de la chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mngon du gyur to/ /'di ltar sgrib pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud cing sems la kun nas dkris
346a7(mdo sde): p a med pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong
346b1(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang lhan cig tu smra zhing gtam zer te/ 'di ltar mun pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'bod
346b2(mdo sde): cing yang dag par mgu bar byas pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mes byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/
346b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mes byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/
346b4(mdo sde): 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir
346b5(mdo sde): zhe na| de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi
346b6(mdo sde): pham pa zhes bya ba gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos ma thag tu kun nas dkris pa bsal bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
346b7(mdo sde): blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
347a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims ma nyams par bya'o/ /tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims shin tu bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims ma
347a2(mdo sde): 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / tshul khrims rdzogs par bya ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la chags par mi bya/
347a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchog tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa med pa'i
347a4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur pas ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam sems la mi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par
347a5(mdo sde): thar pa mngon du gyur na sgrim mi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
347a6(mdo sde): med| gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su
347a7(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin pa med na/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de ltar mchog
347b1(mdo sde): tu 'dzin pa gang gis kyang tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin pa med do/ /'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du de'i
347b2(mdo sde): pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa
347b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/
347b4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo
347b5(mdo sde): gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir drang srong de mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba bskal pa mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa de'i
347b6(mdo sde): pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol bskal pa grangs med brjod du med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu med de/ sangs
347b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med cing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan no/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan
348a1(mdo sde): p a de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na blo gros 'bar ba zhes bya ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la dge
348a2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig yod de/ blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de la mi phyed pa'i g.yog sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa
348a3(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa'i bram ze khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu yod do/ /yang 'jam dpal/ blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
348a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcur mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings mi
348a5(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de gang lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol
348a6(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pas blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
348a7(mdo sde): blo gros 'bar ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba de ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /blo gros 'bar ba/ ci'i phyir
348b1(mdo sde): dbyings de mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bya zhe na/ blo gros 'bar ba/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni/ gsog pa'ang med/ 'bri ba'ang med/ len pa'ang med/ 'god pa'ang med
348b2(mdo sde): zad pa'ang med/ 'gog pa'ang med/ 'grib pa'ang med/ 'phel ba'ang med/ rigs kyang ma yin/ rigs med pa'ang ma yin/ 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ 'dzin pa'ang ma yin/
348b3(mdo sde): 'dor ba'ang ma yin/ gzung ba'ang ma yin/ gtong ba'ang ma yin/ phra ba'ang ma yin/ zab pa'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ nyin par yang ma yin/ mtshan
348b4(mdo sde): mo'ang ma yin/ ring po'ang ma yin/ thung ngu'ang ma yin/ nye ba'ang ma yin/ ring ba'ang ma yin/ yangs pa'ang ma yin/ dog pa'ang ma yin/ gcig bu'ang ma yin/ thun mong yang

348b6(mdo sde): ma yin| skye ba'ang ma yin te/ de ltar 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings de ni/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong
348b7(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la'ang mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings kun dris so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
349a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de bstan pa bshad de/ des mi 'khrugs pa'i
349a2(mdo sde): dbyings thos ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas drang mi 'khrugs
349a3(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros de bar snang la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
349a4(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa'ang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor re re na'ang byang chub sems
349a5(mdo sde): dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dang /
349a6(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos
349a7(mdo sde): bstan pa re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
349b1(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa la zhugs pa dang / nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong
349b2(mdo sde): ngo / /mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /
349b3(mdo sde): bde gshegs chos tshul ji bzhin thos nas su/ /mi mchog bdag gis bzod pa zhi ba rnyed/ /bgyid po gang yang ma mchis bgyid ma mchis/ /chos nyid dag la gnas par the tshom
349b4(mdo sde): bral| |bdag gis 'jig rten rig khyod gsung thos nas/ /chos 'di thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings 'drar 'tshal/ /bdag gis ring nas stor rnyed mthun bgyis te/ /gter chen
349b5(mdo sde): ji ltar yun ring stor ba bzhin/ /deng bdag bzod pa'i shugs ni rgya chen skyes/ /chos kyi tshul ni yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal/ /de rig bdag gis the tshom dogs kun spangs/ /'jig
349b6(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yas mthong / /ji ltar bya rnams sgo nga 'khrugs nas ni/ /sgo nga steng ngam zhabs su mchus brtol te/ /rang gi sgo nga bcag nas byung ba bzhin/ /bde gshegs
349b7(mdo sde): khyod gsung thos nas bdag kyang 'byung / /bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i sa kun bor/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yas mthong / /rgyal ba bye ba mtha' yas bzod stobs
350a1(mdo sde): gnas| |bde gshegs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung bstan/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /rgyal sras lung bstan de
350a2(mdo sde): dag de bzhin ston/ /bzod stobs rnyed pas seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ /nam mkha'i bya lam 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong / /nam mkha' 'di la mchis nas bdag gis kyang / /
350a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba bde bar gshegs pa mtha' yas kyis/ /bzod thob sras la bde gshegs rang byung 'gyur/ /skye bo bdud zhags 'grol zhes lung ston mthong / /nam mkha' bya lam
350a4(mdo sde): 'dir mchis bdag gis kyang / /bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas rnams/ /dgra yi tshogs bcom kun mkhyen legs 'chang sras/ /'gro mgon zil mi non 'gyur
350a5(mdo sde): lung ston mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras spyad pa spyod pa dag /'gro phan byang chub rdul med btsal slad du/ /rgyal srid rin chen mgo mig gtong ba dang / /mthu rnyed bstan pa
350a6(mdo sde): thub pa'i khur khyer mthong / /rgyal sras dga' ldan gnas nas shi 'phos te/ /lha yi bu mo brgya yis glu blangs shing / /bkra shis bcas pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon bstod nas/ /
350a7(mdo sde): rgyal rigs drang srong bram ze'i rigs skye mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras zla bcu mngal gnas pa/ /lha yi gnas na lha yi bu bzhin du/ /snying rdzes chos ston lha rnams rab tu
350b1(mdo sde): 'dul| |mngal na gnas pa mi yis mngon mchod mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras yum gyi lhums nas su/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mngon par mchod cing byung / /sems dge bas na mi
350b2(mdo sde): gtsang rdul mi chags/ /rin chen nyes pas mi gos bzhin du mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras rgyal srid rin chen bdun/ /brgya phrag bcu po bu yi tshogs rnams dang / /rta dang glang pos gang
350b3(mdo sde): ba'i sa spangs te/ /bdud kyi zhags bcad mngon par byung ba mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras 'gro la sman slad du/ /khrag khrig bdud rnams zil mnan byang chub reg /nyon mongs ring bsags
350b4(mdo sde): rnam mang dpa' bos spangs/ /bde gshegs nyi ma bzhin du lhan pa mthong / /bdag gis rgyal sras rang gi nyon mongs btul/ /mtshungs med dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /lha mi
350b5(mdo sde): sems can khrag khrig rnams btul zhing / /zad mthar 'gro ba lan gsum bskor ba mthong / /bdag gis rgyal pa stong phrag mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyu zhing sems can
350b6(mdo sde): 'dul| |'gro la sman slad 'gro ba stong par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi bzhin sems can sad mdzad mthong / /bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa/ /sems can btul nas sangs rgyas
350b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad/ /lce steng byung ba'i mchil ma mis bor bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs tshogs gnas su 'dor ba mthong / /bdag gis sangs rgyas stong phrag mtha' yas pa/ /zhi bar 'gro
351a1(mdo sde): ba me la chus btab bzhin/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal khur skyo mya ngan bzlas/ /stobs bcu nyon mongs kun spangs 'das pa mthong / /bdag gis rgyal ba stong
351a2(mdo sde): phrag mtha' yas pa/ /'gro la sman don mdzad cing sku gdung bral/ /mya ngan 'das kyang skye bo mya ngan zlo/ /mya ngan 'das kyang bstan pa brjod pa mthong / /de ltar 'gro la sman
351a3(mdo sde): slad skyabs su mchi/ /dge ba bsags pa 'di yis sangs rgyas gyur/ /bdag nyid grol nas sems can khrag khrig 'grol/ /mgon med bdud zhags bcings pa zhi bar bgyi/ /
351a4(mdo sde): de nas drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la bzod
351a5(mdo sde): p a'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa brjod du med
351a6(mdo sde): par nam yang gti mug par ma gyur/ nam yang 'dod pa ma spyad/ nam yang bud med kyi dbang du ma gyur/ nam yang bdud kyi spyod yul la ma spyad/ nam yang mngal gyi gnas
351a7(mdo sde): sum zhugs/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par brdzus te skyes/ nam yang bdud kyi las kyis ma bsgribs/ nam yang bdud kyi las kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur/ nam yang byang chub kyi
351b1(mdo sde): sems dang bral bar ma gyur/ nam yang 'khor bas skyo ba'i sems ma bskyed/ sems can thams cad la phan ba dang ldan pa ma yin pa nam yang dran pa med pa'i sems ma bskyed
351b2(mdo sde): do| |bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ nam yang chags pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ bskal ba brjod du med par
351b3(mdo sde): nam yang skye ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ nam yang yang 'byung ba ma btsal/ nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar ma gyur/ nam yang dman pa'i
351b4(mdo sde): sems dang ldan par ma gyur/ nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur/ nam yang thams cad
351b5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs par ma gyur/ nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi ldan par ma gyur/ nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dngos por ma dmigs/ de
351b6(mdo sde): nam yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par ma bsam/ des nam yang dus gsum mnyam pa las lam log par ma bsten/ des nam yang dus gsum
351b7(mdo sde): dmigs par ma gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin
352a1(mdo sde): na| 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs
352a2(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyad pas ji ltar ngas brjod pa bzhin du de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas
352a3(mdo sde): so| |'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pas sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyir
352a4(mdo sde): rtsom pa mi 'dor ro/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la mos par bya'o/ /yang 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad sgrub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
352a5(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
352a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med cing rgya chen po bskyed de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas brjod
352a7(mdo sde): du med pa'i bar du rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod
352b1(mdo sde): du med pa rgya chen po bskyed do/ /'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal ba dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa na rin chen
352b2(mdo sde): byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
352b3(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzang po'i lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa
352b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de'i che de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i gsung rab la dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ shin tu
352b5(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu blo gros dang ldan pa/ shin tu dran pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pa rnyed
352b6(mdo sde): pa| sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ste/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de ma
352b7(mdo sde): gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mos pa'i blo gros ji tsam du mdzes pa de tsam gyi mdzes pa'i sems can su'ang med de/ de blta bas chog mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig
353a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ tshad med pa'i chos nyid las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
353a2(mdo sde): bzhi rnyed de/ 'dod pa bzhin rnyed cing nyon mongs pa med par rnyed/ tshegs med par rnyed nas 'dris par byas te/ re zhig ni/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
353a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems mi 'jug go/ stobs bcu'i pa rol tu son pas 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams su 'gro'o/ /de nas dge slong mos
353a4(mdo sde): p a'i blo gros de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i zhabs
353a5(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des de bzhin
353a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzings chen po bca' bar 'tshal ba dang / zam pa chen po gdags par 'tshal ba dang / 'khor
353a7(mdo sde): ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad bsgral bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs
353b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha'
353b2(mdo sde): yas pa yongs su dag pa sgrub par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang la brtsan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzang
353b3(mdo sde): po'i lhas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong de dag dang / yon tan tshad med pa gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
353b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam mo/ /mtshan mor 'du shes yid la mi byed pa dang / nyin par 'du shes dang / grang bar
353b5(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / dro bar 'du shes dang / bkres par 'du shes dang / zas su 'du shes dang / skom du 'du shes dang / btung bar 'du shes dang / gos su 'du shes pa yid la
353b6(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / stobs su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed cing / 'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed par sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du byas te brtson 'grus brtsam
353b7(mdo sde): mo| |sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam ste/ des brtson 'grus brtsams na/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro/ /
354a1(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su dag
354a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs
354a3(mdo sde): pa bzang po'i lha des de bzhin du bstan cing gdams nas des 'du shes thams cad yid la ma byas te/ sgrib med pa'i rnam par thar pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bskal
354a4(mdo sde): pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams nas spyad do/ /de nas bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad 'das pa dang / de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab
354a5(mdo sde): tu gnas par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcus nges par byung ste/ des sprul pa khrag khrig tshad med pa mngon par sprul nas lha la dad pa rnams la lhar mngon
354a6(mdo sde): par sprul/ klu la dad pa rnams la klur/ gnod sbyin la dad pa rnams la gnod sbyin du/ dri za la dad pa rnams la dri zar/ grul bum la dad pa rnams la grul bum du/ lha
354a7(mdo sde): ma yin la dad pa rnams la lha ma yid du/ nam mkha' lding la dad pa rnams la nam mkha' lding du/ mi'am ci la dad pa rnams la mi'am cir/ lto 'phye chen po la dad pa
354b1(mdo sde): rnams la lto 'phye chen por mngon par sprul to/ /de ltar dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can sprul pa ji lta bu la dad pa bzhin du rtag tu rgyun
354b2(mdo sde): mi chad par mngon par sprul te/ des der sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor bas myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de
354b3(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha des dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
354b4(mdo sde): mkhyen nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu mgu par byas
354b5(mdo sde): nas de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsngags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis de yang dag
354b6(mdo sde): par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i
354b7(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i shugs 'di lta bu rnyed de/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te 'dug go /'jam dpal/ de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros
355a1(mdo sde): bar snang la 'dug nas 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes rnyed de/ gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams su sangs
355a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa shes/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes/
355a3(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes so/ /des ye shes de rnyed nas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la the tshom med cing sangs rgyas bcom
355a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa la'ang the tshom med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
355a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mngon par bstod do/ /stobs bcu stobs 'chang stobs rab stobs ldan pa/ /nor mang bged cing sras rnams nor ldan mdzad/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi sras rnams
355a6(mdo sde): nor mang rnyed/ /'gro 'di shin tu sdug bsngal nor ldan mdzad/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi nor rnams gtor cing gos/ /rgyal pa khyod kyi sras mchog nor rnyed nas/ /dga' zhing
355a7(mdo sde): 'gro la smin pa'i spyod mchog spyod/ /rgyal mchog rgyal ba dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thub mchog khyod sras yon tan brgyas ldan pa/ /spyod pa'i dam pa mchog 'di rnam spyod
355b1(mdo sde): ba| |skye bar nub cing rga shis gtses pa dang / /'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya ldan gzir ba rnams/ /sdug bsngal bdag med stong par rtogs pas na/ /shi 'phos 'gror mchis
355b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'gror chags pa/ /mthong nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal bder bgod cing / /de dag snying rje rlabs chen rnyed par 'gyur/ /'gro la sman sems snying rje bskyed nas su/ /'khor
355b3(mdo sde): pa'i sred pa bcom yang skye ba 'dzin/ /dge ba tshad med rnams kyang dran gsog cing / /'gro ba rnams la sman bde zhi bar bgyid/ /log pa'i lam mchis sems can stong rnams
355b4(mdo sde): ni/ /stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam mchog rnams su ste/ /zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi bde dge ba ni/ /gang nas sngon gyi rang byung gshegs par bgod/ /de dag stong pa tshad med gtong ba ni/ /
355b5(mdo sde): mgo lag mig bzang bu sdug de bzhin du/ /tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin/ /thos dran mkhas shing mos dang stobs la gnas/ /shing dbang drung du bdud sde bcas
355b6(mdo sde): par btul/ /dpe med ye shes go 'phang mchog der rnyed/ /rang byung sems can stong rnams khrid nas su/ /mi 'chi byung zhi bde ba zhi bar gshegs/ /nam mkha' 'di la de ring bdag
355b7(mdo sde): mchis nas/ /phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu ma nor de bzhin gsung / /rgyal sras rgyal pa'i yon tan spyod spyad nas/ /shin tu lung ston pa ni du ma mthong / /de dag rang gi spyod thos dga'
356a1(mdo sde): mgu ste| |rab tu 'dzum dmul yid gnyis the tshom bral/ /thal mo sbyar te mngon par lus btud nas/ /stobs bcu yon tan mnga' ba mkha' las bstod//
356a2(mdo sde): de ring nam mkha' 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong / /'khor ba brgyar ni rgyal sras dge spyad nas/ /dga' ldan lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ /dri bral dpe med glang chen
356a3(mdo sde): mchog gyur nas/ /lha yi gnas nas rab tu babs nas su/ /yum bde nyal ba'i lhums su zhugs pa la/ /lha rnams stong gis shin tu rab mchod cing / /lha mi lha mo rnams kyis
356a4(mdo sde): gtsor bgyis bstod/ /de dag yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa na/ /lha yi gnas 'dra rab tu mdzes par gyur/ /mngal gyis mi gos chu las pad+ma ltar/ /yum la bde zhing
356a5(mdo sde): yang bar gnas nas su/ /lha rnams brgya la rab tu chos bshad de/ /lha mchog 'khor rnams dge ba'i lam du btsud/ /de dag chos tshig rgya chen thos nas su/ /skom pas chu
356a6(mdo sde): la sa bzhin bdud rtsi 'thung / /nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/ /rgyal sras dri med blo gros dran mkhas pa/ /yum gyi phyag gis shing gi yal ga bzung / /
356a7(mdo sde): mtshan khung nas ni byung ba rab tu mthong / /lha dang mi yi dbang pos rab mchod cing / /sa yi steng na 'jigs med gom pa 'dor/ /de yis thams cad phyogs su bltas nas
356b1(mdo sde): su| |'dzum dmul tshig smras nga 'dra khams gsum med/ /nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/ /rgyal sras mang po 'gro la sman dga' ba/ /grong dang grong khyer rin chen
356b2(mdo sde): gtams pa yi/ /rab tu 'byor zhing ldan pa'i sa bor te/ /bal glang rmig pas bcings pa bcad pa ltar/ /blo gros mchog gis khyim chags bsal bcom ste/ /'gro la sman slad
356b3(mdo sde): dpa' bo mngon par byung / /sdug bsngal zhi zhing srid zad bdud rtsi tshol/ /nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/ /rgyal sras brtul zhugs dka' thub drag spyad de/ /
356b4(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas byang chub shing dbang drung / /g.yo can bdud btul byang chub dam pa reg /rgyal ba thams cad dang ni mnyam rnyed nas/ /zhi dga' bde gnas zhing mchog lta
356b5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /smon lam rgya chen bdag gis 'dir rdzogs te/ /'khor brgyar legs spyad brtul zhugs 'di grub bo/ /nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/ /phyogs bcu'i
356b6(mdo sde): stobs bcu shin tu mang po dag / 'khor lo rgya chen rab tu bskor ba ni/ /pha rol rgol 'dul 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi/ /skal yod 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs bcom/ /mun pa'i
356b7(mdo sde): rdul bsal 'gro rnams bde ba byin/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis de thos nas/ /'khor ba'i rgyud bsal ma song phyogs su song / /de ring nam mkha' 'di la bdag mchis
357a1(mdo sde): nas| |rgyal ba brgya dag lha mi 'khor 'dul zhing / /lha mi gnas nas 'gro la snying brtse yid/ /'jig rten dag na rab tu zhugs pa mthong / /rgyal
357a2(mdo sde): ba brgya phrag du ma gzhan dag kyang / /'khor ba zad song zhi bar rdul med gnas/ /lha mi brgya rnams yid dgar gyur nas su/ /ring bsrel dam pa de la mchod pa mthong / /'jig
357a3(mdo sde): rten gtso bo rkang gnyis mchog khyod la/ /lha dang mi dang khyim bdag khyod drung mchis/ /zhal nas zhi rab chos kyi rang bzhin thos/ /khyod kyi spyod ldan myur du skyabs su 'gro/ /
357a4(mdo sde): mi dbang khyod kyi yon tan yang dag bstod/ /khya mchog phan byed stobs bcu yon tan 'chang / /zhi bar ldan zhing dul ba zhi ba rnyed/ /'khor ba'i rgyud bral 'jigs med
357a5(mdo sde): phyogs su song / /bde gshegs mi yi seng+ge khyod kyi mthus/ /blo mchog khyod kyang steng gi mkhar gnas pa/ /mngon shes lnga las nyams pa med rnyed nas/ /phyogs bcur
357a6(mdo sde): 'khor rgyud rab 'byams rnam mang ba/ /mtshungs med du ma de ring mthong ba ni/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dri med spyod/ /yang dag yon tan gyis ni de dag bstod/ /rgyal
357a7(mdo sde): ba khyod kyi yon tan mtha' mi rnyed/ /de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis
357b1(mdo sde): bstod nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar ma gyur te/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pas sangs
357b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten stongs par byas/ lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad yongs su chad cing
357b3(mdo sde): mi khom pa thams cad chad par gyur to/ /de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dang yang skyes pa na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas thog mar byung ba bzhin du
357b4(mdo sde): shin tu ngo mtshar du shes te/ gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der gang de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba de na ltas 'byung ba de dag de skye ba'i ltas su byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs
357b5(mdo sde): pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na ltas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na ltas gang byung ba
357b6(mdo sde): de dag des mngon par shes pa lnga bshad pa'i tshe'ang ltas de dag byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de'i tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe'ang ltas
357b7(mdo sde): de dag byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na'ang ltas de dag byung ngo / /des tshe rabs re re la'ang sems can
358a1(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa theg pa chen po la btul/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul to/ /re zhig
358a2(mdo sde): ni| byang chub sems dpa' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba de lta bu dag sems can rnams la
358a3(mdo sde): bstan to/ /'jam dpal/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du yid gnyis dang the tshom za na/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de
358a4(mdo sde): ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/
358a5(mdo sde): de lta bas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge slong mos pa'i blo gros brtson 'grus kyi
358a6(mdo sde): stobs gang dang ldan par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshegs
358a7(mdo sde): chung ngus sems mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dbang po'i don las
358b1(mdo sde): sems slar sdud de/ dbang po'i don la'ang dbang po'i don mi dmigs shing / dbang po'i don ni/ dbang po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong / dbang po'i don dang / dbang po'i mtshan ma'ang ma
358b2(mdo sde): dmigs/ gang gis dbang po'i mtshan mar dmigs pa de'ang mi dmigs so/ /bam po gsum pa/ 'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med/ grangs
358b3(mdo sde): med| bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na bdud rtsi snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ 'jam dpal/
358b4(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i snying po'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
358b5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /
358b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de byung ba'i tshe thams cad kyi thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bral ba'i sgra ma byung ngo / /gang sems can
358b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sgra de'ang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon
359a1(mdo sde): pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ don shes/ chos shes/ dus shes/ tshod shes/ bdag shes/ 'khor shes/
359a2(mdo sde): gang zag rab dang tha ma shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa la bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid
359a3(mdo sde): du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/ /des bshad pa rnams kyang bzungs ste/ bdag gi don yang mi gtong ngo / /des bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gi bar du 'dod pa'i 'du shes
359a4(mdo sde): ma bskyed/ gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed/ srog dang ldan pa dang / gang zag dang ldan pa'i rtog pa ma bskyed/ dngos po dang
359a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ chos dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'ang ma
359a6(mdo sde): yin| rnam par 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma yin/ nye du la rtog pa'ang ma yin/ nye du ma yin pa la rtog pa'ang ma yin/ shes pa la rtog pa'ang ma yin/ mi shes pa la
359a7(mdo sde): rtog pa'ang ma yin/ ljongs la rtog pa'ang ma yin/ mi dga' bar rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/ sems can dang ldan pa'i rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/ srog dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gang
359b1(mdo sde): zag dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ chos dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan ma dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan
359b2(mdo sde): ma med pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ smon lam dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ smon lam ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ 'khor ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan
359b3(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin/ ye shes dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ ye shes ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rang
359b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ so so'i skye
359b5(mdo sde): bo dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa med pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma
359b6(mdo sde): bskyed de/ 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms/ rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
359b7(mdo sde): la nam yang bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa la bsnyen bkur byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
360a1(mdo sde): la des g.yog dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsnyen cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas de phyin chad
360a2(mdo sde): bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing du nam yang ma skyes/ nam yang zhing du 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas su 'du shes kyang ma skyes/ nam yang byang
360a3(mdo sde): chub kyi sems rgyun du mi 'byung bar ma gyur/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur dang g.yog byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
360a4(mdo sde): cad du sprul pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/ gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang de na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam du shes te/ rdzu
360a5(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can de dag la ston to/ /gang deng gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang der sems can ji lta bu la mos pa de lta bur sprul pa sprul te 'dul
360a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang sbyar te rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprul pa rnam pa du mar sprul to/ /sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan yang sprul te bstan
360a7(mdo sde): to| |'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa mngon par sprul te/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa de dag gis kyang sprul pa gzhan mngon par sprul pa
360b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/ dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis kyang sprul pa mngon par sprul te/ sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan mngon par sprul to/ /'jam dpal/ de ji snyam

360b3(mdo sde): zhe na| de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ sgrib pa med pa'i
360b4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsten par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o/ /byang chub
360b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba

361b1(mdo sde): ldog pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
361b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can brjod du med pa rnams theg pa gsum gyis rab tu 'god do/ /yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dge slong sbrin gyi

361b5(mdo sde): btab bo/ /'jam dpal/ de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du so so'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
361b6(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas te sems can dpag tu med cing brjod du med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs
361b7(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po des dus thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma gsum du bzung ngo / /de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten du
362a1(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga byung ste/ sems can skal ba med par gyur nas dam pa'i chos nub pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa
