421b2(mdo sde): dag la shin tu ri mo bskyed de 'dug pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs kyi mna' ma gyos sgyug gi mdun na 'dug pa bzhin du dam pa de dag la ri mo skyes par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
421b3(mdo sde): nad pa nad kyis btab nas yun ring mo las sman pa mthong na/ dbugs byung ba de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de'ang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu dbugs
421b4(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gsad pa la thug pa'i mi gsad du bkri ba las don bya bar 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ bde bar 'dod pa'i mi la la zhig byung ste/ des de gsad pa las
421b5(mdo sde): thar par byas nas de mi de la 'di ni/ bdag gi skyabs/ bdag la snying brtse ba can zhes de byas pa gzo ba cher skyes pa bzhin du/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin yang
421b6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de dag la bdag gi skyabs/ bdag la snying brtse ba can no/ /zhes byas pa gzo ba skyes so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi
421b7(mdo sde): mas byin la smras pa/ nyi mas byin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ u
422a1(mdo sde): d um wa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
422a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba/ zab pa/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs
422a3(mdo sde): par dka' ba/ brtag tu med pa/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa/ byang
422a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ /bsti stang dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pa la ni/

423a7(mdo sde): med cing gdags pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang btags pa
423b1(mdo sde): med cing gdags pa ma yin no/ /nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni/ tha snyad tsam ste/ nam mkha' la bris pa tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang

423b6(mdo sde): bzhin du gzugs kyang ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang 'di ltar ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma
423b7(mdo sde): yin no| |nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni/ 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang
424a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam
424a2(mdo sde): las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/ /nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni/ 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la
424a3(mdo sde): bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
424a4(mdo sde): par shes pa'ang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no/ /nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper
424a5(mdo sde): na| nam mkha' la bris pa 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang 'di ltar 'du
424a6(mdo sde): shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/ /nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni/ brda tsam ste/ brda
424a7(mdo sde): tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang 'di ltar brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar
424b1(mdo sde): du gzhan ma yin no/ /nyi mas byin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshig gang gis nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin/ don dam par mi dmigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor
424b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs/ ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi de bzhin
424b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs so/ /nyi mas byin/ ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sdug
424b4(mdo sde): cing phongs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten du gtogs par mi blta'o/ /gang ye shes 'di lta
424b5(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi grangs su mi 'gro'o/ /gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ gdags par bya ba ma yin no/ /gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ byang chub mngon
424b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'khor ba las bskyod pa ma yin no/ /gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin
424b7(mdo sde): no| |mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/ /gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no/ /
425a1(mdo sde): gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ zhi bar spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ma zhi bar spyod pa'ang ma yin no/ /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu
425a2(mdo sde): nyi mas byin gyis skyes bu dam pa grags byin gyis bshad pa la legs so/ /zhes shin tu bstod de rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas yang skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gis bram ze'i
425a3(mdo sde): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/
425a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di thos kyang skrag par ma gyur/ shin tu skrag par ma gyur/ ma myos/ myos par ma gyur pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gang la bslab
425a5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i sa ni/ 'di yin no/ /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas tshig zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas
425a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyin par gyur to/ /bam po bdun pa ste/ tha ma/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po
425a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' mchog ces bya ba de ga la ba der
425b1(mdo sde): dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
425b2(mdo sde): dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la rab zhugs tshul rnams la/ /mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni legs so zhes/ /gang gis mi mchog shin tu
425b3(mdo sde): 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni mi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol/ /'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su/ /byang chub mchog la mi rnams rab tu 'jug /gang thos drang srong chen por 'gyur
425b4(mdo sde): ba dang / /tshul de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs/ /bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su/ /thub pas sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par bstod/ /rgyal bas de yid rab
425b5(mdo sde): tu dga' bar mdzad/ /de dag thos nas shin tu gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba bdag gis ji tsam 'tshal ba rnams/ /'dren pa bdag gis chos rnams bshad lags te/ /ston pas ji ltar
425b6(mdo sde): chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/ /'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol/ /de la dga' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa yis/ /rgyal sras spyod pa gang la spyad pas na/ /mi yi gtso bo
425b7(mdo sde): 'dren par 'gyur ba yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par bstan/ /thams cad chos zhes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig /mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /zhi ba nga med
426a1(mdo sde): mi g.yo yon tan med/ /spobs pa med cing zhi ba 'tsho ba med/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang bas stong / /dngos po nyid med cung zad med pa ste/ /'di ni bstan pa
426a2(mdo sde): ma yin ston pa med/ /bshad pa med cing 'chad par byed pa'ang med/ /tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang med/ /shes pa ma yin shes par byed pa'ang med/ /su la'ang ma yin gang gis kyang
426a3(mdo sde): min te/ /'di dag ma byas byed du bcug pa'ang med/ /sus kyang blangs pa med cing btang pa'ang med/ /sus kyang bsgrags pa med la thos pa'ang med/ /sus kyang mi shes rnam par
426a4(mdo sde): shes pa'ang med/ /'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ba med/ /'di ni zhi ba ma yin rgod pa'ang min/ /zhi bar mi byed zhi bar byas pa'ang med/ /byed pa ma yin byed pa med pa'ang
426a5(mdo sde): min/ /sems pa med cing tshor bar byed pa'ang med/ /'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas pa'ang min/ /'pho ba ma yin mi 'pho ba yang min/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba yod pa min/ /'di ni
426a6(mdo sde): kun tu mi 'chi skye ba med/ /skye ba med cing bskyed pa'ang ma yin te/ /'di ni 'gags pa med la 'gags pa'ang min/ /'di ni brtan pa med cing bshig pa'ang med/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams
426a7(mdo sde): bshig pa'ang med/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shes par gyis/ /'dren pa bde bar gshegs pa gang 'das pa/ /de dag gis kyang tshul 'di rab tu bstan/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byon 'byung ba rnams
426b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba/ /rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul 'di ston/ /chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'
426b2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu shes 'gyur te/ /mkhas pas shes par dka' ba rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras ji tsam shes pa dag /'gro ba gtses pa 'di
426b3(mdo sde): la mya ngan med/ /de la snying rje bla na med pa ste/ /'gro ba kun la byams par shin tu gnas/ /stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur pas na/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tshom med/ /mtshan ma
426b4(mdo sde): med par gnas par gyur pas na/ /de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod med de/ /rlung rnams nam mkha' dag la mi thogs bzhin/ /dpa' bo de dag 'gro bar mi chags so/ /bskal pa mang
426b5(mdo sde): por bye bar kun 'khor zhing / /sems can bye ba mang po ston par byed/ /kun tu kun nas nyon mongs mi 'gyur te/ /de ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus/ /gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye
426b6(mdo sde): bstan te/ /de dag nyan thos kyis zhes smra na yang / /ngas ni chos nyid yang dag rab rtogs te/ /khyod ni 'dren pa min zhes de smra'o/ /dri ma med pa'i ye shes mig sbyangs te/ /bdag ni the tshom
426b7(mdo sde): ma lus rnam par byang / /stong par bdag ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /khyod ni gang zag mchog min par dengs shig /de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstan pas na/ /gang la 'dren pa'i sras
427a1(mdo sde): rnams gnas pa la/ /bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis thub dka' ste/ /ji ltar ri bo bskyod par mi nus bzhin/ /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu
427a2(mdo sde): n yi mas byin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob
427a3(mdo sde): ste| dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu thob pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
427a4(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu
427a5(mdo sde): med pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa'ang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis mchod cing yum gyi rum
427a6(mdo sde): du 'gro ba'ang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor ba'ang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
427a7(mdo sde): khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba'ang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
427b1(mdo sde): pa'ang mthong / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol pa'ang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
427b2(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spyod lam dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sems can rnams 'dul
427b3(mdo sde): ba'ang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
427b4(mdo sde): 'da' ba'ang mthong ngo / /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin par snang la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su
427b5(mdo sde): bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ legs so legs so rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog /'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa/ /bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes bzhin du/ /dngos bral
427b6(mdo sde): mtshungs med ci yang ma lags pa/ /mtshan ma ma mchis nam mkhar bris pa bzhin/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te/ sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan sprul bzhin/ /
427b7(mdo sde): yang dag tu na rgyal bas bstan ma mchis/ /sos ka'i dus kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin du/ /snang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te/ /ston pa
428a1(mdo sde): gang lags de yang de dang 'dra/ /sngon chad the tshom nem nur gang byung ba/ /de yang 'dren pa'i drung du bral gyur te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
428a2(mdo sde): chos kyang rig / 'gro ba sgrol mdzad rnam par 'dren par shog /stobs bcu dag gis bsgrubs ba ci 'dra bar/ /rgyal ba'i zhing mchog bzang po sbyang bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba
428a3(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtsor gyur te/ /skye bo ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par bgyi/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams/ /gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang ma mchis pa'i/ /skyabs su
428a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thar bgyi ste/ /rga shi bral ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bgyi/ /bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi/ /sems
428a5(mdo sde): can bdud kyi yul nas stongs nas su/ /drang srong chen po'i yul du drang bar bgyi/ /bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa/ /gang gis thos nas gang la'ang mi reg pa/ /de dag
428a6(mdo sde): mchog gi tshul la gnas par 'gyur/ /'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur/ /chos nyid 'di ltar mi gang rab rtogs shing / /ston pa rgyal ba'i dbang po'i spyan snga nas/ /
428a7(mdo sde): bstan bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba/ /de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur/ /stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing / /stong par dmigs pa'i 'du shes
428b1(mdo sde): bral gyur na/ /de dag ma smas bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid/ /mkhas pa btsog pa la ni mi dga' ste/ /zas kyi ro rnams la yang chags ma
428b2(mdo sde): mchis| |rtogs pa'i dgon pa'i gnas la shin tu mos/ /de dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur/ /sbyangs pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag /de dag rtag tu rab tu gnas
428b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu dga'/ /rab tu dga' bas byang chub mchog kyang thob/ /de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngags/ /de la mkhas pa gnas
428b4(mdo sde): pas 'di mthong ste/ /zhi ba gang la bde gshegs gnas pa yi/ /byang chub de ni 'jig rten 'dren pas bsngags/ /'dren pa khyod las stong pa deng thos te/ /ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis
428b5(mdo sde): bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur bar bgyi/ /mi mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par dgrol/ /thub pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs
428b6(mdo sde): shing / /chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tshom bral/ /de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/ /'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i/ /bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags
428b7(mdo sde): pas na| |bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
429a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par sems kyang smyos pa dang / glen par ma gyur to/
429a2(mdo sde): /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur to/ /nam yang log par ltung bar ma gyur to/ /nam yang gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par ma gyur to/ /
429a3(mdo sde): nam yang gzhan gyi ngor lta bar ma gyur ro/ /nam yang bskal pa brjod du med par tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur to/ /
429a4(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil
429a5(mdo sde): gyis gnon pa/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bzang skyong zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil
429a6(mdo sde): gyis gnon pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mkhas pa'i snying por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
429a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
429b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na tsan+dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyob byin zhes bya ba de'i tshe
429b2(mdo sde): de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tsan+dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa de
429b3(mdo sde): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon bzang po de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to//
429b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no/ /gang de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni/
429b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu kun tu 'dzin par gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na gang
429b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs
429b7(mdo sde): shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /'jam dpal
430a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur te/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ de
430a2(mdo sde): lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi ngor mi lta bar 'dod na/ chos kyi
430a3(mdo sde): dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ 'grogs par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang
430a4(mdo sde): tshul can du bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la
430a5(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags/ sangs rgyas bcom
430a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
430a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi/ byang
430b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings
430b2(mdo sde): su yongs su zhus pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
430b3(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs
430b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa/
430b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
430b6(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na'ang dge slong dpa' sra zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs
430b7(mdo sde): pa| bye brag phyed pa/ rtogs pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal
431a1(mdo sde): mtshan de la rim gro byed par gyur to/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas te
431a2(mdo sde): bshad pa rnams kyang gzungs su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
431a3(mdo sde): kyis rim gro byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur
431a4(mdo sde): te| de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang / bar
431a5(mdo sde): dang / tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
431a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad la'ang
431a7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung
431b1(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
431b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te/ de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra des
431b3(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal
431b4(mdo sde): pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du chos thams
431b5(mdo sde): cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/ dpa' sra/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams cad ni/ cung zad kyang gzhan du
431b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs
431b7(mdo sde): thob pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag
432a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong / kha cig ni/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ kha cig ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
432a2(mdo sde): 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig ni/ tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
432a3(mdo sde): las 'da' ba mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /
432a4(mdo sde): zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la/ /shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su/ /sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /
432a5(mdo sde): sems ni nam yang gzhan du ma bsam ste/ /rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag /chos rnams stong bar bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ /de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par
432a6(mdo sde): bsam| |bdag tu smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa/ /mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan/ /chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /de la bdag ni the tshom cang ma mchis/
432a7(mdo sde): mig 'di dam pa'i don du stong par ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs/ /mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te/ /mdzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la slad/ /
432b1(mdo sde): nges par sna lce rna ba de bzhin te/ /lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong pa nyid/ /sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags/ /gzugs kyang gzugs
432b2(mdo sde): kyis rnam par dben zhing stong / /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong / /chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste/ /skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid
432b3(mdo sde): kyis stong / /bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste/ /'di la mdzangs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslad/ /gang na'ang stong par rig pa ma mchis par/ /nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes
432b4(mdo sde): dang mtshungs/ /gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa/ /de ni nam yang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur/ /gang gis ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed par/ /rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen/ /rang bzhin med
432b5(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyis ci zhig skyed/ /rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o/ /thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas/ /mi 'gyur 'tshe ba ma mchis zhi ba ste/ /ji ltar nam mkha'
432b6(mdo sde): rig pa ma mchis ltar/ /de la mi mdzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi bsgul ba/ /de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus/ /'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i//
432b7(mdo sde): chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan/ /gang gis yang dag chos rnams nges rtogs pa/ /des ni rgyal ba rnam 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa/ /de dag
433a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis/ /gang gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa/ /des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs bkur stir bgyis/ /de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod
433a2(mdo sde): bgyis te/ /byang chub mchog tu de dag 'tshang yang rgya/ /gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa
433a3(mdo sde): des bzung ste/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/ /rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung / /bde bar gshegs pa'i
433a4(mdo sde): shul 'dir byang chub phyir/ /de la mkhas pa the tshom gzhar mi 'byung / /bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa/ /chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis 'tshal/ /'dren pa
433a5(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur/ /shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgrol/ /'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig pas na/ /bdag gis de ring chos kyi yab la mchod/ /gang slad mi yi gtso
433a6(mdo sde): bo khyod 'phags pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su mchi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i
433a7(mdo sde): rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzungs dang / zhi gnas dang /
433b1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis sems can thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /'jam dpal/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' srar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam
433b2(mdo sde): dpal| khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras zhes bya bar gyur
433b3(mdo sde): to| |de lta bas na/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo la
433b4(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /de la slob pa'i tshe yang sems gang la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing thogs pa med pas bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs pa de dang de yang mngon
433b5(mdo sde): sum du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ nga stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa na/ ye shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i ye shes de
433b6(mdo sde): lta bu rab tu thob bo/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can
433b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
434a1(mdo sde): bco brgyad 'das pa na rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar
434a2(mdo sde): shes so| |'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na dge ba bsags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
434a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na
434a4(mdo sde): bai DUR+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi phung po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/
434a5(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag gnyis 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
434a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char
434a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brgyad brgya 'das pa na zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
434b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na sprin gyi kha dog ces bya
434b2(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes
434b3(mdo sde): so| |'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na
434b4(mdo sde): nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs
434b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na me long dkyil 'khor snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
434b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
434b7(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu 'das pa na zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
435a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na dus las 'das zhes bya
435a2(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes

435a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis

435a7(mdo sde): cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa

435b2(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rin po che kun tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
435b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med

435b6(mdo sde): zhing brjod du med pa bco brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams

436a2(mdo sde): /'jam dpal/ shar gyi

437b6(mdo sde): la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin ces bya ba shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi
437b7(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
438a1(mdo sde): dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa
438a2(mdo sde): bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de
438a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad
438a4(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
438a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs
438a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes
438a7(mdo sde): so| |'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen
438b1(mdo sde): me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/
438b2(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na shin tu mdzes zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
438b3(mdo sde): yod de| de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
438b4(mdo sde): brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tsan+dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de
438b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul
438b6(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
438b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs
439a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad par shes pa ni/ brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi
439a2(mdo sde): zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa'ang brjod
439a3(mdo sde): du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mi rig go / 'jam dpal/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
439a4(mdo sde): med pa thos na myos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i
439a5(mdo sde): bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam dpal/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tshom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs
439a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal/ ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/
439a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
439b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni/ bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
439b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag
439b3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa/ theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa nas theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
439b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir
439b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas
439b6(mdo sde): b dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya
439b7(mdo sde): cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
440a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag par lung bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher
440a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i
440a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba bsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas bcom ldan
440a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'das pa'i dus/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bskyed phyir/ /de na nga

440a6(mdo sde): ston| |sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing / /stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas/ /so so yang dag rig la mkhas/ /gnas dang gnas min dbang
440a7(mdo sde): yang thob/ /las dang ye shes rtogs par rig /las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang / /rnam par smin la the tshom med/ /khams rnams du mar shes pa dang / /rnam par 'dren pa shin
440b1(mdo sde): tu ldan| |sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams/ /ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can rnams kyi dbang po yi/ /rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen/ /dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams/ /ma
440b2(mdo sde): lus par yang rab tu mkhyen/ /bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug dang tshad med la/ /rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu bslab/ /sangs rgyas
440b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas/ /sangs
440b4(mdo sde): rgyas zhing gi rgya dris te/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba/ /bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/ /gang rnams khyod kyis

440b6(mdo sde): du gsol/ /sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang / /ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba/ /nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas/ /mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor/ /mi rnams gang gis
440b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa/ /nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de yi lam dang bsam pa rnams/ /'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/ /ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang / /byung nas ji ltar gnas
441a1(mdo sde): pa dang / /ji ltar de las ldang ba rnams/ /ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa/ /ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / /zhi
441a2(mdo sde): gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams/ /rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang / /gang gi rkyen gyis bshad pa yang / /de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te/ /de la
441a3(mdo sde): the tshom mi mnga' khyod/ /khyod kyis bskal pa byer spyad pas/ /ye shes 'di las nges par byung / /ston pas stobs kyi mthu yang brnyes/ /drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan/ /bskal
441a4(mdo sde): pa stong phrag bye ba yi/ /bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang / /spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing / /bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen/ /gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /skye ba thams
441a5(mdo sde): cad du yang 'jug / de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis/ /ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen/ /gang du ji 'dra skye ba dang / /gang du rigs kyang ji 'dra ba/ /ji ltar kun tu spyad pa rnams/ /de dag
441a6(mdo sde): 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /tha ma'i chos rnams ji 'dra ba/ /'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang / /'gro ba gang du skye ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /ji 'dra ba yi
441a7(mdo sde): ye shes kyis/ /sngon chad rnam par lung bstan pa/ /mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pas/ /de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod/ /tshul khrims gang dang chos gang dang / /ji 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / /ye
441b1(mdo sde): shes gang la zhugs pa yang / /de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /gang dang gang gi las kyis su/ /skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnam smin ji 'dra thob pa yang / /de dag mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/ /
441b2(mdo sde): gang du gnas pa de dag gi /rgyun du mchi bar nges pa yang / /de yang khyod kyis ma lus mkhyen/ /de slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyod/ /gang gi lus kyis sems gang skyes/ /de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/ /
441b3(mdo sde): sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa/ /de yang 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen/ /sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni/ /khyod dang 'dra ba yong ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams dang / /'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra/ /
441b4(mdo sde): srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams/ /rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen/ /de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'/ /gang dang gang gi lus kyis su/ /ji lta bu yi rgyud du mchi/ /

441b6(mdo sde): rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho mkhyen/ /khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na/ /thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis/ /zag pa zad pa'ang rab

442a1(mdo sde): mkhyen| |gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang / /nyon mongs 'di dag gang 'byung mkhyen/ /nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na/ /bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams/ /de
442a2(mdo sde): dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te/ /de las khyod ni pha rol phyin/ /bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang / /nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi/ /lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /de slad

442a5(mdo sde): sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan/ /de dag nga yi chos thos nas/ /bsti stang mtshungs med bskyed nas su/ /sems ni thams cad nyer bzhag ste/ /
442a6(mdo sde): dri med sems kyis de dag nyan/ /sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /byang chub mchog la nges par gyur/ /nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur/ /sangs rgyas
442a7(mdo sde): bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bshad kyang / /bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ /rgya chen bshad pa mi zad do/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod par/ /drang srong chen
442b1(mdo sde): pos zhing bsngags pa/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad/ /de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan/ /gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang / /sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang / /bde
442b2(mdo sde): bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa/ /gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi rnyed/ /gang la bshad pa de yang stod/ /'di la
442b3(mdo sde): mgon med 'gro ba myos/ /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs
442b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bud med kyi dbang po las gyur te/ /de phyin chad bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
442b5(mdo sde): s ems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub
442b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/

443a1(mdo sde): 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub
443a2(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/ /
443a3(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
443a4(mdo sde): tshad med pa phrag brgya ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la

443a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi
443a7(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg
443b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas slad kyis
443b2(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya su war+N+Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
443b3(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom
443b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
443b5(mdo sde): dga' bo/ byang chub kyi sems ni/ gser dang rang bzhin 'dra bar gnas par blta bar bgyi'o/ /gser rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ltar byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
443b6(mdo sde): par gnas so/ /mgar bas gser la bzo'i bye brag tha dad par byas kyang gser rang bzhin mi 'gyur pa ltar/ byang chub kyi sems la yon tan khyad par sna tshogs par snang yang don dam par
443b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems las ma g.yos pas rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems nyid rnam par dag /bdag dang
444a1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi don la brtson/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid du sgom/ /shes rab skye ba'i rgyu la mos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
444a2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
444a3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya su war+N+Na bA lu ko pa ma nA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod
444a4(mdo sde): skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
444a5(mdo sde): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
444a6(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' phrag mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig
444a7(mdo sde): tu gzar nas phus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
444b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci de bzhin gshegs
444b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
444b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ dpag tu med do/ /kun dga'
444b4(mdo sde): bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lan gnyis su
444b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags
444b6(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
444b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
445a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni/ dpag tu med do/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ yon tan dpag
445a2(mdo sde): tu med pa dang ldan no/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs
445a3(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong rnams la
445a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /
445a5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis maud+gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus
445a6(mdo sde): phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dag tu 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dag tu mchi ba
445a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo/ khyod la don 'di dpes bstan
445b1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /dper na/ rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong ba/ chus
445b2(mdo sde): gang ba/ bya khwas btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan
445b3(mdo sde): pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la zhon te/ de'ang mu khyud kyi shing yang chu la mi reg /rta rnams kyi rmig pa'ang chu la mi reg /pad+ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi brtol ba tsam gyi stobs
445b4(mdo sde): dang | shugs dang / mgyogs pa de lta bus rgyug la/ kun dga' bo/ de nas rdzing de'i nang nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung bas shing rta de mtsho'i nang nas phyir ma log pa de'i bar skabs su
445b5(mdo sde): shing rta de lan brgyad bskor na/ kun dga' bo/ sprul gdug pas shing rta lan gcig bskor ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo/ /khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad
445b6(mdo sde): ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo/ /khyod tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su maud+gal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /
445b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ /maud+gal gyi bu chen po tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su gnas brtan shwa ra dwa ti'i bu chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/ /gnas
446a1(mdo sde): brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med pa ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas
446a2(mdo sde): tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa ston cing don kyang go bar byed
446a3(mdo sde): do| |kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo/ gnas brtan maud+gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri
446a4(mdo sde): 'da'o| |kun dga' bo/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang /
446a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams
446a6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar song la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad ra
446a7(mdo sde): bas bskor te ra pas bskor nas rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / gyo dum med par byas te mtho dman med par byas nas grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ grong khyer gcig tu byas
446b1(mdo sde): nas kyang yungs 'brus bkang ste byur bur byas na/ kun dga' bo/ grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can byang chub
446b2(mdo sde): la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang
446b3(mdo sde): ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
446b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan
446b5(mdo sde): gyi lha'i ris dag nas 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de
446b6(mdo sde): bas kyang ches mang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten khams dag na byang
446b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas rab
447a1(mdo sde): tu byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba bsten pa dag nges mthong ngo / /de
447a2(mdo sde): bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
447a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la
447a4(mdo sde): gces par byed pa'i mchog dang gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
447a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas
447a6(mdo sde): kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches
447a7(mdo sde): mang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang
447b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo / /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
447b2(mdo sde): rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa dang / gdung mthun pa sha stag yin na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag na byang chub sems
447b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la bskor ba byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa
447b4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa mtshan tha dad pa dang / gdung tha dad pa dag
447b5(mdo sde): lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang / /
447b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi
447b7(mdo sde): khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ kun dga' bo/ /
448a1(mdo sde): dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA'i klung gyi bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu
448a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni/ dkon te/ kun dga' bo/ ji
448a3(mdo sde): ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa de bzhin du gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang /
448a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni/ nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa
448a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
448a6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo b+he dang / pra dz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen
448a7(mdo sde): gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //
